GK22vispancu:579: na devatā-prasādaṃ vinā śaṣpa-bhojino vyālākīrṇa evaṃvidhe vane niḥśaṅkā nandato bhramanti /
GK22vispancu:581: damanaka āha-svāmin etad abhihitaṃ mayā yad etad-vanaṃ caṇḍikā-vāhana-bhūtasya piṅgalakasya viṣayībhūtam /
GK22vispancu:583: tat tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhrātṛ-snehenaikatra bhakṣaṇa-pāna-viharaṇa-kriyābhir eka-sthānāśrayeṇa kālo neyaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:585: uktaṃ ca saharṣaṃ svāminaḥ sakāśād abhaya-dakṣiṇā dāpayitavyā iti /
GK22vispancu:587: tac chrutvā piṅgalaka āha-sādhu sumate sādhu /
GK22vispancu:589: mama hṛdayena saha saṃmantrya bhavaedam abhihitam /
GK22vispancu:591: paraṃ so 'pi mad-arthe'bhaya-dakṣiṇāṃ yācayitvā drutataram ānīyatām iti /
GK22vispancu:594: mantribhir dhāryate rājyaṃ sustambhair iva mandiram //Panc_1.137//
GK22vispancu:597: karmaṇi vyajyate prajñā svasthe ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ //Panc_1.138//
GK22vispancu:598: damanako 'pi taṃ praṇamya saṃjīvaka-sakāśa prasthitaḥ saharṣam acintayat- aho prasāda-saṃmukhī naḥ svāmī vacana-vaśagaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:599: tan nāsti dhanyataro mama / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:602: atha saṃjīvaka-sakāśam āsādya sa-praśrayam uvāca-bho mitra prārthito 'sau mayā bhavad-arthe svāmy-abhaya-pradānam /
GK22vispancu:604: paraṃ tvayā rāja-prasādam āsādya mayā saha samaya-dharmeṇa vartitavyam /
GK22vispancu:606: aham api tava saṅketena sarvā rājya-dhuram amātya-padavīm āśrityoddhariṣyāmi /

GK22vispancu:609: nṛ-prajāḥ prerayaty eko hanty anyo 'tra mṛgān iva //Panc_1.140 //
GK22vispancu:612: nṛpāsannān sa mānyo 'pi bhraśyate dantilo yathā //Panc_1.141//
GK22vispancu:616: asty atra dharātale vardhamānaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:617: tatra dantilo nāma nānā-bhāṇḍa-patiḥ sakala-pura-nāyakaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:618: tena pura-kāryaṃ nṛpa-kāryaṃ ca kurvatā tuṣṭiṃ nītās tat-pura-vāsino lokā nṛpatiś ca /
GK22vispancu:619: kiṃ bahunā, na ko 'pi tādṛk kenāpi caturo dṛṣṭo śruto vā /
GK22vispancu:625: athaivaṃ gacchati kāle danitlasya kadācid vivāhaḥ sampravṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:626: tatra tena sarve pura-nivāsino rāja-saṃnidhi-lokāś ca sammāna-puraḥsaram āmantrya bhojitā vastrādibhiḥ sat-kṛtāś ca /
GK22vispancu:627: tato vivāhānantaraṃ rājā sāntaḥpuraḥ sva-gṛham ānīyābhyarcitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:628: atha tasya nṛpater gṛha-sammārjana-kartā gorambho nāma rāja-sevako gṛhāyāto 'pi tenānucita-sthāna upaviṣṭo 'vajñāyārdha-candraṃ dattvā niḥsāritaḥ /
GK22vispancu:629: so 'pi tataḥ prabhṛti niśvasann apamānān na rātrāv apy adhiśete /
GK22vispancu:630: kathaṃ mayā tasya bhāṇḍapate rāja-prasāda-hāniḥ kartavyā iti cintayann āste /

GK22vispancu:639: tac chrutvā rājā sa-sambhramam utthāya tam uvāca-bho bho gorambha /
GK22vispancu:643: rātri-jāgaraṇena dyūtāsaktasya me balān nidrā samāyātā /

GK22vispancu:648: yad vāñchati divā martyo vīkṣate vā karoti vā /
GK22vispancu:649: tat svapne'pi tad-abhyāsād brūte vātha karoti vā //Panc_1.144//
GK22vispancu:651: śubhaṃ vā yadi pāpaṃ yan nṝṇāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GK22vispancu:652: sugūḍham api taj jñeyaṃ svapna-vākyāt tathā madāt //Panc_1.145//
GK22vispancu:654: jalpanti sārdham anyena paśyanty anyaṃ sa-vibhramāḥ /
GK22vispancu:655: hṛd-gataṃ cintayanty anyaṃ priyaḥ ko nāma yoṣitām //Panc_1.146//
GK22vispancu:657: ekena smita-pāṭalādhara-ruco jalpanty analpākṣaraṃ vīkṣante'nyam itaḥ sphuṭat-kumudinī-phullollasal-locanāḥ /
GK22vispancu:658: dūrodāra-caritra-citra-vibhavaṃ dhyāyanti cānyaṃ dhiyā kenetthaṃ paramārthato 'rthavad iva premāsti vāma-bhruvām //Panc_1.147//
GK22vispancu:662: raho nāsti kṣaṇo nāsti nāsti prārthayitā naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:664: yo mohān manyate mūḍho rakteyaṃ mama kāminī /
GK22vispancu:665: sa tasyā vaśago nityaṃ bhavet krīḍā-śakuntavat //Panc_1.150//
GK22vispancu:666: tāsāṃ vākyāni kṛtyāni svalpāni sugurūṇy api /
GK22vispancu:667: karoti saḥ kṛtair loke laghutvaṃ yāti sarvataḥ //Panc_1.151//
GK22vispancu:668: striyaṃ ca yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchati /
GK22vispancu:669: īṣac ca kurute sevāṃ tam evecchanti yoṣitaḥ //Panc_1.152//
GK22vispancu:672: nāsāṃ kaścid agamyo 'sti nāsāṃ ca vayasi sthitiḥ /
GK22vispancu:673: virūpaṃ rūpavantaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhujyate //Panc_1.154//
GK22vispancu:674: rakto hi jāyate bhogyo nārīṇāṃ śāṭikā yathā /
GK22vispancu:676: alaktiko yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā /
GK22vispancu:678: evaṃ sa rājā bahuvidhaṃ vilapya tat-prabhṛti dantilasya prasāda-parāṅmukhaḥ saṃjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:680: dantilo 'py akasmād eva prasāda-parāṅmukham avanipatim avalokya cintayāmāsa-aho sādhu cedam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:681: ko 'rthān prāpya na garvito viṣayiṇaḥ kasyāpado 'staṃ gatāḥ
GK22vispancu:682: strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāmā rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:683: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntara-gataḥ ko 'rthī gato gauravaṃ
GK22vispancu:684: ko vā durjana-vāgurāsu patitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān //Panc_1.157//
GK22vispancu:686: kāke śaucaṃ dyūta-kāreṣu satyaṃ sarpe kṣāntiḥ strīṣu kāmopaśāntiḥ /
GK22vispancu:687: klībe dhairyaṃ madyape tattva-cintā rājā mitraṃ kena dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā //Panc_1.158//
GK22vispancu:688: aparaṃ mayāsya bhūpater athavānyasyāpi kasyacid rāja-sambandhinaḥ svapne'pi nāniṣṭaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:689: tat kim etat-parāṅmukho māṃ prati bhūpatiḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:690: evaṃ taṃ dantilaṃ kadācid rāja-dvāre viṣkambhitaṃ vilokya saṃmārjana-kartā gorambho vihasya dvārapālān idam ūce-bho bho dvārapālāḥ /
GK22vispancu:692: tad anena nivāritena yathāhaṃ tathā yūyam apy ardha-candra-bhājino bhaviṣyatha /
GK22vispancu:693: tac chrutvā dantilaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam idam asya gorambhasya ceṣṭitam /
GK22vispancu:697: api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāc cen nṛpati-sevakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:698: tathāpi na parābhūtiṃ janād āpnoti mānavaḥ //Panc_1.160//
GK22vispancu:699: evaṃ sa bahu-vidhaṃ vilapya vilakṣa-manāḥ sodvego gata-prabhāvaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ niśāmukhe gorambham āhūya vastra-yugalena saṃmānyedam uvāca-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:700: mayā na tadā tvaṃ rāga-vaśān niḥsāritaḥ /

GK22vispancu:703: so 'pi svarga-rājyopamaṃ tad-vastra-yugalam āsādya paraṃ paritoṣaṃ gatvā tam uvāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin /
GK22vispancu:705: tad asya saṃmānasya kṛte paśya me buddhi-prabhāvaṃ rāja-prasādaṃ ca /
GK22vispancu:709: aho sasadṛśo ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca //Panc_1.161//
GK22vispancu:710: tataś cānye-dyuḥ sa gorambho rāja-kule gatvā yoga-nidrāṃ gatasya bhūpateḥ saṃmārjana-kriyāṃ kurvann idam āha-aho aviveko 'smad-bhūpateḥ /
GK22vispancu:712: tac chrutvā rājā sa-vismayaṃ tam uvāca-re re gorambha /
GK22vispancu:715: kiṃ tvayā kadācid aham evaṃvidhaṃ karma samācaran dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:716: so 'bravīt-dyūtāsaktasya rātri-jāgaraṇena saṃmārjanaṃ kurvāṇasya mama balān nidrā samāyātā /
GK22vispancu:719: tat prasādaṃ karotu svāmī nidrā-paravaśasya iti /
GK22vispancu:720: evaṃ śrutvā rājā cintitavān-yan mayā janmāntare purīṣotsargaṃ kurvatā kadāpi cirbhaṭikā na bhakṣitā /
GK22vispancu:721: tad yathāyaṃ vyatikaro 'sambhāvyo mamānena mūḍhena vyāhṛtaḥ /

GK22vispancu:725: tad-abhāvena rāja-kṛtyāni paura-kṛtyāni na sarvāṇi śithilatāṃ vrajanti /

GK22vispancu:727: ato 'haṃ bravīmi yo na pūjayate garvāt iti /

GK22vispancu:743: evam uktvā sakala-mṛga-parivṛto yamunā-kaccham avatīryodaka-grahaṇaṃ kṛtvā svecchayā tad eva vanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:744: tataś ca karakaṭa-damanaka-nikṣipta-rājya-bhāraḥ saṃjīvikena saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhīm anubhavann āste /
GK22vispancu:748: saṃjīvakenāpy aneka-śāstrāvagāhanād utpanna-buddhi-prāgalbhyena stokair evāhobhir mūḍha-matiḥ piṅgalako dhīmāṃs tathā kṛto yathāraṇya-dharmād viyojya grāmya-dharmeṣu niyojitaḥ /

GK22vispancu:754: phala-hīnaṃ nṛpaṃ bhṛtyāḥ kulīnam api connatam /

GK22vispancu:768: upajīvanti śaktyā hi jalajā jaladān iva //Panc_1.168//

GK22vispancu:773: taṃ ca krauñca-ripoḥ śikhī giri-sutā-siṃho 'pi nāgāśanam /

GK22vispancu:800: tatra deva-śarmā nāma parivrājakaḥ partivasati sma /

GK22vispancu:818: tat kiṃ kurvato me saṃsāra-samudrottaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /

GK22vispancu:838: maitrī cāpraṇayāt samṛddhir anayāt snehaḥ pravāsāśrayāt
GK22vispancu:839: strī garvād anavekṣaṇād api kṛṣis tyāgāt pramādād dhanam //Panc_1.180//
GK22vispancu:840: tat tvayā vrata-grahaṇānantaraṃ maṭha-dvāre tṛṇa-kuṭīrake śayitavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:844: atha kṛta-śayana-samayaṃ devaśarma-nigrahaṃ kṛtvā śāstrokta-vidhinā śiṣyatām anayat /
GK22vispancu:846: punas tathāpi muniḥ kakṣāntarān mātrāṃ na muñcati /
GK22vispancu:848: na kathañcid eṣa me viśvāsam āgacchati /
GK22vispancu:852: evaṃ cintayatas tasya devaśarmaṇo 'pi śiṣya-putraḥ kaścid grāmād āmantraṇārthaṃ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:855: tac chrutvā devaśarmāṣāḍhabhūtinā saha prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prasthitaḥ /

GK22vispancu:1155: yatra kanyāntaḥpure vāyuṃ muktvā nānyasya praveśo 'sti tatra rakṣā-puruṣādhiṣṭhite kathaṃ mama tasyā saha samāgamaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1159: evam abhidhāya tat-kṣaṇāt kīla-sañcāriṇaṃ vainateyaṃ bāhu-yugalaṃ vāyuja-vṛkṣa-dāruṇā śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padmānvitaṃ sa-kirīṭa-kaustubham aghaṭayan /

GK22vispancu:1161_0: anena viṣṇu-rūpeṇa gatvā kanyāntaḥpure niśīthe tāṃ rājakanyām ekākinīṃ sapta-bhūmika-prāsāda-prānta-gatāṃ
GK22vispancu:1161_1: mugdha-svabhāvāṃ tvāṃ vāsudevaṃ manyamānāṃ svakīya-mithyā-vakroktibhī rañjayitvā

GK22vispancu:1207: evaṃ bahu-vidhaṃ vicintya devīṃ rahaḥ-sthāṃ provāca-devi,
GK22vispancu:1209: tasya kṛtāntaḥ kupito yenaitad evaṃ kriyate /
GK22vispancu:1210: devy api tad ākarṇya vyākulī-bhūtā satvaraṃ kanyāntaḥpure gatvā tāṃ khaṇḍitādharāṃ nakha-vilikhita-śarīrāvayavāṃ duhitaram apaśyat /

GK22vispancu:1225: yato na sa mānuṣaiḥ sahālāpaṃ karoti /

GK22vispancu:1228: tāvat tasmin samaye garuḍārūḍhaṃ taṃ śaṅka-cakra-gadā-padma-hastaṃ yathokta-cihnāṅkitaṃ vyomno 'vatarantaṃ nārāyaṇam apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:1229: tataḥ sudhā-pūra-plāvitam ivātmānaṃ manyamānas tām uvāca-priye /
GK22vispancu:1230: nāsty anyo dhanyataro loke mattas tvattaś ca /

GK22vispancu:1236: atrāntare sa rājā devī-mukhena tāṃ duhitaram uvāca-putri,
GK22vispancu:1237: tvayi duhitari vartamānāyāṃ nārāyaṇe bhagavati jāmātari sthite tat kim evaṃ yujyate yat sarve pārthivā mayā saha vigrahaṃ kurvanti /

GK22vispancu:1248_1: nānā-prakāra-vastra-puṣpa-bhakṣya-peyāṃś ca preṣayan duhitṛ-mukhena tam ūce-bhagavan,

GK22vispancu:1288: kauliko 'pi tān hatān dṛṣṭvā pramudita-manā gaganād avatīrṇaḥ san,

GK22vispancu:1314: yasya kṣetraṃ nadī-tīre bhāryā ca para-saṅgatā /
GK22vispancu:1315: sa-sarpe ca gṛhe vāsaḥ kathaṃ syāt tasya nirvṛtiḥ //Panc_1.229//
GK22vispancu:1317: sarpa-yukte gṛhe vāso mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ /

GK22vispancu:1334: ekaḥ kulīrako nānā-jala-cara-sametaḥ sametya tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ sādaram idam ūce-māma /

GK22vispancu:1352: prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvaiva pātakaṃ vasudhā /

GK22vispancu:1370: sāmprataṃ sarveṣāṃ svalpa-jalāśayānāṃ jalacarā guru-jalāśayeṣu sva-svajanair nīyante /

GK22vispancu:1381: tāta mātula bhrātaḥ iti bruvāṇāḥ ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti samantāt paritasthuḥ /
GK22vispancu:1382_0: so 'pi duṣṭāśayaḥ krameṇa tān pṛṣṭha āropya jalāśayasya nātidūre śilāṃ samāsādya
GK22vispancu:1382_1: tasyām ākṣipya svecchayā bhakṣayitvā bhūyo 'pi jalāśayaṃ samāsādya jalacarṇāṇāṃ mithyā-vārtā-sandeśakair

GK22vispancu:2296: adharmād api ṣaḍ-bhāgo jāyate yo na rakṣati //Panc_1.375//
GK22vispancu:2298: rājñaḥ śriyaṃ kulaṃ prāṇān nādagdhvā vinivartate //Panc_1.376//
GK22vispancu:2299: rājā bandhur abandhūnāṃ rājā cakṣur acakṣuṣām /
GK22vispancu:2300: rājā pitā ca mātā ca sarveṣāṃ nyāya-vartinām //Panc_1.377//
GK22vispancu:2301: phalārthī pārthivo lokān pālayed yatnam āsthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2304: phala-prado bhavet kāle tadval lokaḥ surakṣitaḥ //Panc_1.379//
GK22vispancu:2306: tathānyad api yat kiñcit prajābhyaḥ syān nṛpasya tat //Panc_1.380//
GK22vispancu:2307: athaivaṃ garuḍaḥ samākarṇya tad-duḥkha-duḥkhitaḥ kopāviṣṭaś ca vyacintayat-aho /
GK22vispancu:2309: tad adya gatvā taṃ samudraṃ śoṣayāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2310: evaṃ cintayatas tasya viṣṇu-dūtaḥ samāgatyāha-bho garutman /
GK22vispancu:2314: tac chrutvā garuḍaḥ sābhimānaṃ prāha-bho dūta /
GK22vispancu:2316: tad gatvā taṃ vada yad anyo bhṛtyo vāhanāysamat-sthāne kriyatām /
GK22vispancu:2317: madīyo namaskāro vācyo bhagavataḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2318: yo na vetti guṇān yasya na taṃ seveta paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2319: na hi tasmāt phalaṃ kiñcit sukṛṣṭād ūṣarād iva //Panc_1.381//
GK22vispancu:2321: kadācid api bhagavantaṃ prati tvayā naitad abhihitam īdṛk /
GK22vispancu:2325: tad yadi nigrahaṃ na karoti tad ahaṃ bhagavato na bhṛtya ity eṣa niścayas tvayā vācyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2326: tad drutataraṃ gatvā bhavatā bhagavataḥ samīpe vaktavyam /
GK22vispancu:2327: atha dūta-mukhena praṇaya-kupitaṃ vainateyaṃ vijñāya sammāna-puraḥsaraṃ tam ānayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2328: bhaktaṃ śaktaṃ kulīnaṃ ca na bhṛtyam avamānayet /
GK22vispancu:2329: putraval lālayen nityaṃ ya icchec chriyam ātmanaḥ //Panc_1.382//
GK22vispancu:2332: te tu sammānitās tasya prāṇair apy upakurvate //Panc_1.383//
GK22vispancu:2333: ity evaṃ sampradhārya rukma-pure vainateya-sakāśaṃ satvaram agamat /
GK22vispancu:2334: vainateyo 'pi gṛhāgataṃ bhagavantam avalokya trapādhomukhaḥ praṇamyovāca-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:2335: tvad-āśrayonmattena samudreṇa mama bhṛtyāsyāṇḍāny apahṛtya mamāpamāno vihitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2337: no ced enam ahaṃ sthalāntaram adyaiva nayāmi /
GK22vispancu:2338: yataḥ svāmi-bhayāc chravaṇo 'pi prahāro na dīyate / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2339: yena syāl laghutā vātha pīḍā citte prabhoḥ kvacit /
GK22vispancu:2340: prāṇa-tyāge'pi tat karma na kuryāt kula-sevakaḥ //Panc_1.384//
GK22vispancu:2344: tena lajjāpi tasyotthā na bhṛtyasya tathā punaḥ //Panc_1.385//
GK22vispancu:2345: tad āgaccha yenāṇḍāni samudrād ādāya ṭiṭṭibhaṃ sambhāvayāvaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2347: tathānuṣṭhite samudro bhagavatā nirbharsyāgneyaṃ śaraṃ sandhyāyābhihitaḥ-bho durātman /
GK22vispancu:2350: tataḥ samudreṇa sa-bhayena ṭiṭṭibhāṇḍāni tāni pradattāni /
GK22vispancu:2354: tad ākarṇya sañjīvakas tam eva bhūyo 'pi papraccha-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:2356: iyantaṃ kālaṃ yāvad uttarottara-snehena prasādena cāhaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2358: tat kathyatāṃ yenāham ātma-rakṣārthaṃ tad-vadhāyodyamaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2362: yadi rakta-netras triśikhāṃ bhrūkuṭiṃ dadhānaḥ sṛkkaṇī parilelihan tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavati,
GK22vispancu:2367: tvayā ca yathāyaṃ mantra-bhedo na bhavati tathā kāryam /
GK22vispancu:2368: yadi niśāmukhaṃ prāpya gantuṃ śaknoṣi tad-deśa-tyāgaḥ kāryaḥ / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:2369: tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet /
GK22vispancu:2371: āpad-arthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api /
GK22vispancu:2372: ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api //Panc_1.387//
GK22vispancu:2375: athavātmā sāmādibhir upāyair ābharakṣaṇīyaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2376: api putra-kalatrair vā prāṇān rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2377: vidyamānair yatas taiḥ syāt sarvaṃ bhūyo 'pi dehinām //Panc_1.388//
GK22vispancu:2379: yena kenāpy upāyena śubhenāpy aśubhena vā /
GK22vispancu:2380: uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret //Panc_1.389//
GK22vispancu:2381: yo māyāṃ kurute mūḍhaḥ prāṇa-tyāge dhanādiṣu /
GK22vispancu:2382: tasya prāṇāḥ praṇaśyanti tair naṣṭair naṣṭam eva tat //Panc_1.390//
GK22vispancu:2393: daivaṃ nihatya kuru pauruṣam ātma-śaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ //Panc_1.392//
GK22vispancu:2394: karaṭaka āha-tat kathaya kīdṛk tvayā nīti-bījaṃ nirvāpitam /
GK22vispancu:2395: so 'bravīt-mayānyonyaṃ tābhyāṃ mithyā-prajalpena bhedas tathā vihito yathā bhūyo 'pi mantrayantāv eka-sthāna-sthitau na drakṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:2397: na yuktaṃ bhavatā vihitaṃ yat parasparaṃ tau snehārdra-hṛdayau sukhāśrayau kopa-sāgare prakṣiptau / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2399: janma-janmāntare duḥkhī sa naraḥ syād asaṃśayam //Panc_1.393//
GK22vispancu:2400: aparaṃ tvaṃ yad bheda-mātreṇāpi hṛṣṭas tad apy ayuktam,
GK22vispancu:2401: yataḥ sarvato 'pi jano virūpa-karaṇe samartho bhavati nopakartum / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2402: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādayitum /
GK22vispancu:2403: pātayitum asti śaktir vāyor vṛkṣaṃ na connamitum //Panc_1.394//
GK22vispancu:2407: jāta-mātraṃ na yaḥ śatruṃ vyādhiṃ ca praśamaṃ nayet /
GK22vispancu:2408: mahā-balo 'pi tenaiva vṛddhiṃ prāpya sa hanyate //Panc_1.395//
GK22vispancu:2411: sa tasya sahajaḥ śatrur ucchedyo 'pi priye sthitaḥ //Panc_1.396//
GK22vispancu:2412: tan mayā sa udāsīnatayā samānīto 'bhaya-pradānena yāvat tāvad aham api tena sācivyāt pracyāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2414: dadyāt sādhur yadi nija-pade durjanāya praveśaṃ
GK22vispancu:2415: tan-nāśāya prabhavati tato vāñchamānaḥ svayaṃ saḥ /
GK22vispancu:2417: jārāpi syād gṛha-patir iti śrūyate vākyato 'tra //Panc_1.397//
GK22vispancu:2418: tena mayā tasyopari vadhopāya eva viracyate /
GK22vispancu:2420: tac ca tvāṃ muktvānyo na jñāsyati /
GK22vispancu:2421: tad uktam etat te svārthāyānuṣṭhitam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2426: aparaṃ sācivyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati tṛptiś ceti /
GK22vispancu:2427: tad-guṇa-traye'sminn upasthite kasmān māṃ dūṣayasi tvaṃ jāḍya-bhāvāt / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2428: parasya pīḍanaṃ kurvan svārtha-siddhiṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2429: mūḍha-buddhir na bhakṣeta vane caturako yathā //Panc_1.399//
GK22vispancu:2434: asti kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe vajra-daṃṣṭro nāma siṃhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2435: tasya caturaka-kravyamukha-nāmānau śṛgāla-vṛkau bhṛtya-bhūtau sadaivānugatau tatraiva vane prativasataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2436: athānya-dine siṃhena kadācid āsanna-prasavā prasava-vedanayā sva-yūthād bhraṣṭoṣṭry upaviṣṭā kasmiṃścid vana-gahane samāsāditā /
GK22vispancu:2437: atha tāṃ vyāpādya yāvad udaraṃ sphoṭayati,
GK22vispancu:2439: siṃho 'pi dāserakyāḥ piśitena saparivāraḥ parāṃ tṛptim upāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2440: paraṃ snehād bāla-dāsekaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛham ānīyedam uvāca-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2441: na te'sti mṛtyor bhayaṃ matto nānyasmād api /
GK22vispancu:2445: evam anuṣṭhite catvāro 'pi na eka-sthāne vihāriṇaḥ parasparam aneka-prakāra-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavantas tiṣṭhanti /
GK22vispancu:2446: śaṅkukarṇo 'pi yauvana-padavīm ārūḍhaḥ kṣaṇam api na taṃ siṃhaṃ muñcati /
GK22vispancu:2447: atha kadācid vajra-daṃṣṭrasya kenacid vanyena matta-gajena saha yuddham abhavat /
GK22vispancu:2448: tena mada-vīryāt sa danta-prahārais tathā kṣata-śarīro vihito yathā pracalituṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:2450: anviṣyatāṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ yenāham evaṃ sthito 'pi taṃ vyāpādyātmano yuṣmākaṃ ca kṣut-praṇāśaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2451: tac chrutvā te trayo 'pi vane sandhyā-kālaṃ yāvad bhrāntāḥ,
GK22vispancu:2453: atha caturakaś cintayāmāsa-yadi śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ vyāpādyeta tataḥ sarveṣāṃ katicid dināni tṛptir bhavati /
GK22vispancu:2454: paraṃ nainaṃ svāmī mitratvād āśraya-samāśritatvāc ca vināśayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2455: athavā buddhi-prabhāveṇa svāminaṃ pratibodhya tathā kariṣye yathā vyāpādayiṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2457: loke buddhimatām atra tasmāt tāṃ yojayāmy aham //Panc_1.400//
GK22vispancu:2458: evaṃ vicintya śaṅkukarṇam idam āha-bhoḥ śaṅkukarṇa /
GK22vispancu:2459: svāmī tāvat pathyaṃ vinā kṣudhayā paripīḍyate /
GK22vispancu:2460: svāmya-bhāvād asmākam api dhruvaṃ vināśa eva /
GK22vispancu:2464: yena te vacanaṃ śīghraṃ nirvikalpaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2465: aparaṃ svāminohite kṛte mayā sukṛta-śataṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2471: yady evaṃ tan madīya-prayojanam etad ucyatām /
GK22vispancu:2478: tad yadi svāmī dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:2479: tataḥ śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ dviguṇa-vṛddhyā sva-śarīraṃ prayacchati dharma-pratibhuvā /
GK22vispancu:2483: atha siṃha-vacanānantaraṃ vṛka-śṛgālābhyāṃ vidāritobhaya-kukṣiḥ śaṅkukarṇaḥ pañcatvam upāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2485: yāvad ahaṃ nadīṃ gatvā snānaṃ devatārcana-vidhiṃ kṛtvāgacchāmi,
GK22vispancu:2486: tāvat tvayātrāpamattena bhāvyam ity uktvā nadyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2487: atha tasmin gate caturakaś cintayāmāsa-kathaṃ mamaikākino bhojyo 'yam uṣṭro bhaviṣyati iti vicintya kravyamukham āha-bhoḥ kravyamukha /
GK22vispancu:2492: so 'pi tac chrutvā yāvat kiñcin māṃsam āsvādayati tāvac caturakeṇoktam-bhoḥ kravyamukha /
GK22vispancu:2496: tathānuṣṭhite siṃhaḥ samāyāto yāvad uṣṭraṃ paśyati tāvad riktīkṛta-hṛdayo dāserakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2497: tato bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā paruṣataram āha-aho kenaiṣa uṣṭra ucchiṣṭatāṃ nīto,
GK22vispancu:2501: mām anādṛtya piśitaṃ bhakṣayitvādhunā man-mukham avalokayasi /
GK22vispancu:2503: tad ākarṇya kravyamukho jīva-nāśa-bhayād dūra-deśaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2504: etasminn antare tena mārgeṇa dāseraka-sārtho bhārākrāntaḥ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2506: tasyāḥ śabdaṃ durato 'py ākarṇya siṃho jambukam āha-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2507: jñāyatāṃ kim eṣa raudraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate'śruta-pūrvaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:2509: caturakaḥ kiñcid vanāntaraṃ gatvā satvaram abhyupetya provāca-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:2517: tat sahasra-guṇam uṣṭram asya sakāśād grahīṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:2518: iti niścitya bṛhan-mānam ādāyāgresarasyoṣṭrasya grīvāyāṃ ghaṇṭāṃ baddhvā badhya-dāseraka-saktān api pitṛ-pitāmahān ādāya vaira-niryātanārtham āyāta eva /
GK22vispancu:2519: siṃho 'pi tac chrutvā sarvato dūrād evāvalokya mṛtam uṣṭraṃ parityajya prāṇa-bhayāt praṇaṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2520: caturako 'pi śanaiḥ śanais tasyoṣṭrasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:2522: atha damanake gate sañjīvakaś cintayāmāsa-aho kim etan mayā kṛtam ?
GK22vispancu:2525: agamyāni pumān yāti yo 'sevyāṃś ca niṣevate /
GK22vispancu:2526: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā //Panc_1.401//
GK22vispancu:2534: dharmārthaṃ yatatām apīha vipado devād yadi syuḥ kvacit
GK22vispancu:2535: tat tāsām upaśāntaye sumatibhiḥ kāryo viśeṣān nayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2536: loke khyātim upāgatātra sakale lokoktir eṣā yato
GK22vispancu:2537: dagdhānāṃ kila vahninā hita-karaḥ seko 'pi tasyodbhavaḥ //Panc_1.402//
GK22vispancu:2542: yad bhāvi tad bhavati nātra vicāra-hetuḥ //Panc_1.403//
GK22vispancu:2543: aparaṃ cānyatra gatasyāpi me kasyacid duṣṭa-sattvasya māṃsāśinaḥ sakāśān mṛtyur bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2548: mahato 'pi kṣayaṃ labdhvā ślāghyaṃ nīco 'pi gacchati /
GK22vispancu:2550: evaṃ niścitya sa sthalita-gatiṃ mandaṃ gatvā siṃhāśrayaṃ paśyann apaṭhat-aho,
GK22vispancu:2555: duḥkhena pravigāhyate sa-cakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam //Panc_1.406//
GK22vispancu:2556: evaṃ paṭhan damanakoktākāraṃ piṅgalakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pracakitaḥ saṃvṛta-śarīro dūrataraṃ praṇāma-kṛtiṃ vināpy upaviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2557: piṅgalako 'pi tathāvidhaṃ taṃ vilokya damanaka-vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ kopāt tasyopari papāta /
GK22vispancu:2558: atha sañjīvakaḥ khara-nakha-vikartita-pṛṣṭhaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ tad-udaram ullikhya katham api tasmād apetaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ hantum icchan yuddhāyāvasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2559: atha dvāv api tau puṣpita-palāśa-pratimau paraspara-vadha-kāṅkṣiṇau dṛṣṭvā karaṭako damanakam āha-bho mūḍha-mate /
GK22vispancu:2560: anayor virodhaṃ vitanvatā tvayā sādhu na kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:2563: kāryāṇy uttama-daṇḍa-sāhasa-phalāny āyāsa-sādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti nīti-kuśalāḥ sāmnaiva te mantriṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2564: niḥsārālpa-phalāni ye tv avidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍodyamais
GK22vispancu:2565: teṣāṃ durnaya-ceṣṭitair narapater āropyate śrīs tulām //Panc_1.407//
GK22vispancu:2566: tad yadi svāmy-abhighāto bhaviṣyati tat kiṃ tavdīya-mantra-buddhyā kriyate /
GK22vispancu:2567: atha sañjīvako na badhyate tathāpy abhavyam /
GK22vispancu:2572: tad vṛthā manoratho 'yaṃ te daṇḍaruceḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2574: teṣāṃ daṇḍas tu pāpīyāṃs taṃ paścād viniyojayet //Panc_1.408//
GK22vispancu:2576: sāmnaiva yatra siddhir na tatra daṇḍo budhena viniyojyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2577: pittaṃ yadi śarkarayā śāmyati ko 'rthaḥ paṭolena //Panc_1.409//
GK22vispancu:2580: sāma-sādhyāni kāryāṇi vikriyāṃ yānti na kvacit //Panc_1.410//
GK22vispancu:2581: na candreṇa na cāuṣadhyā na sūryeṇa na vahninā /
GK22vispancu:2592: so 'yaṃ svāmy-amātyayor ekatamasya kiṃ vā dvayor api vinipātaḥ samutpadyate lagnaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2593: tad yadi kācic chaktir asti tad vicintyatāṃ vinipāta-pratīkāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:2596: tat kartum asamarthatvaṃ yato viparīta-buddhir asi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2598: karmaṇi vyajyate prajñā susthe ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ //Panc_1.412//
GK22vispancu:2600: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādhayitum /
GK22vispancu:2604: yas te vākyaṃ śraddadhāti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2609: tad yadi tvam asya mantrī bhaviṣyasi tadānyo 'pi kaścin nāsya samīpe sādhu-janaḥ sameṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2612: tathā ca śiṣṭa-jana-rahitasya svāmino 'pi nāśo bhaviṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2614: ye ramante nṛpās teṣāṃ ramante ripavaḥ śriyā //Panc_1.416//
GK22vispancu:2616: kevalaṃ doṣo na guṇaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2617: nānāmyaṃ namate dāru nāśmani syāt kṣura-kriyā /

GK22vispancu:2905: iti vicintya teṣām agre sa-karuṇaṃ vilapyedam āha-bho mitrāṇi /
GK22vispancu:2906: yūyaṃ mām ekākinaṃ muktvā gantum udyatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2907: tan me mano bhavadbhiḥ saha sneha-pāśena baddhaṃ bhavad-viraha-nāmnaivākulaṃ sañjātaṃ yathā dhṛtiṃ kvāpi na dhatte /
GK22vispancu:2908: yūyam anugrahaṃ vidhāya sahāya-bhūtaṃ mām api sahaiva nayata /
GK22vispancu:2909: tad-vacaḥ śrutvā te karuṇārdra-cittās tena samam eva sva-deśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2910: athādhvani teṣāṃ pañcānām api pallī-pura-madhye vrajatāṃ dhvāṅkṣāḥ kathayitum ārabdhāḥ-re re kirātāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2914: tataḥ kirātair dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam ākarṇya satvaraṃ gatvā te viprā laguḍa-prahārair jarjarī-kṛtya vastrāṇi mocayitvā vilokitāḥ,
GK22vispancu:2918: tato bhavatāṃ saṃnidhau kvāpi dhanaṃ vidyate tad arpayata /
GK22vispancu:2919: anyathā sarveṣām api vadhaṃ vidhāya carma vidārya pratyaṅgaṃ prekṣya dhanaṃ neṣyāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2920: tadā teṣām īdṛśaṃ vacanam ākarṇya caura-vipreṇa manasi cintitam-yadaiṣāṃ viprāṇāṃ vadhaṃ vidhāyāṅgaṃ vilokya ratnāni neṣyanti,
GK22vispancu:2921: tadāpi māṃ vadhiṣyanti tato 'haṃ pūrvam evātmānam aratnaṃ samarpyaitān muñcāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2922: mṛtyor bibheṣi kiṃ bāla na sa bhītaṃ vimuñcati /
GK22vispancu:2923: adya vābda-śatānte vā mṛtyur vai prāṇināṃ dhruvaḥ //Panc_1.452//
GK22vispancu:2925: gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca prāṇa-tyāgaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2926: sūryasya maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //Panc_1.453//
GK22vispancu:2928: yady evaṃ tato māṃ pūrvaṃ nihatya vilokayata /
GK22vispancu:2929: tatas tais tathānuṣṭhite taṃ dhana-rahitam avalokyāpare catvāro 'pi muktāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2932: athaivaṃ saṃvadatoḥ sañjīvakaḥ kṣaṇam ekaṃ pīṅgalakena saha yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tasya khara-nakhara-prahārābhihito gatāsur vasundharā-pīṭhe nipapāta /
GK22vispancu:2933: atha taṃ gatāsum avalokya piṅgalakas tad-guṇa-smaraṇārdra-hṛdayaḥ provāca-bhoḥ,
GK22vispancu:2934: ayuktaṃ mayā pāpena kṛtaṃ sañjīvakaṃ vyāpādayatā /
GK22vispancu:2935: yato viśvāsa-ghātād anyan nāsti pāpataraṃ karma / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2936: mitra-drohī kṛtaghnaś ca yaś ca viśvāsa-ghātakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2937: te narā narakaṃ yānti yāvac candra-divākarau //Panc_1.454//
GK22vispancu:2940: no yuktam uktaṃ hy anayoḥ samatvaṃ
GK22vispancu:2942: tathā mayā sabhā-madhye sa sadaiva praśaṃsitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2943: tat kiṃ kathayiṣyāmi teṣām agrataḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2944: ukto bhavati yaḥ pūrvaṃ guṇavān iti saṃsadi /
GK22vispancu:2946: evaṃ-vidhaṃ pralapantaṃ damanakaḥ sametya saharṣam idam āha-deva,
GK22vispancu:2947: kātaratamas tavaiṣa nyāyo yad droha-kāriṇaṃ śaṣpa-bhujaṃ hatvetthaṃ śocasi /
GK22vispancu:2948: tan naitad upapannaṃ bhūbhujām / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2949: pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro bhāryāthavā suhṛt /
GK22vispancu:2950: prāṇa-drohaṃ yadā gacched dhantavyo nāsti pātakam //Panc_1.457//
GK22vispancu:2955: tyājyā amī yaś ca kṛtaṃ na vetti //Panc_1.458//
GK22vispancu:2962: akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahān api na pūjyate /
GK22vispancu:2963: pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāga-ghātinam //Panc_1.460//
GK22vispancu:2965: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
GK22vispancu:2967: evaṃ tena sambodhitaḥ piṅgalakaḥ sañjīvaka-śokaṃ tyaktvā damanaka-sācivyena rājyam akarot /
GK22vispancu:2974: athedam ārabhyate mitra-samprāptir nāma dvitīyaṃ tantram /
GK22vispancu:2981: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:2982: tasya nātidūrastho mahocchrāyavān nānā-vihaṅgopabhukta-phalaḥ kīṭair āvṛta-koṭaraś chāyāśvāsita-pathika-jana-samūho nyagrodha-pādapo mahān /
GK22vispancu:2986: viśrabdhaṃ madhupair nipīta-kusumaḥ ślāghyaḥ sa eva drumaḥ
GK22vispancu:2988: tatra ca laghupatanako nāma vāyasaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:2989: sa kadācit prāṇa-yātrārthaṃ puram uddiśya pracalito yāvat paśyati,
GK22vispancu:2990: tāvaj jāla-hasto 'tikṛṣṇa-tanuḥ sphuṭita-caraṇa ūrdhva-keśo yama-kiṅkarākāro naraḥ saṃmukho babhūva /
GK22vispancu:2991: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkita-manā vyacintayat-yad ayaṃ durātmādya mamāśraya-vaṭa-pādapa-sammukho 'bhyeti /
GK22vispancu:2992: tan na jñāyate kim adya vaṭa-vāsināṃ vihaṅgamānāṃ saṅkṣayo bhaviṣyati na vā /
GK22vispancu:2993: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vicintya tat-kṣaṇān nivṛtya tam eva baṭa-pādapaṃ gatvā sarvān vihaṅgamān provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:2997: te taṇḍulā bhavadbhiḥ sarvair api kālakūṭa-sadṛśā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2998: evaṃ vadatas tasya sa lubdhakas tatra baṭa-tala āgatya jālaṃ prasārya sindu-vāra-sadṛśāṃs taṇḍulān prakṣipya nātidūraṃ gatvā nibhṛtaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2999: atha ye pakṣiṇas tatra sthitās te laghu-patanaka-vākyārgalayā nivāritās tāṃs taṇḍulān hālāhālāṅkurān iva vīkṣamāṇā nibhṛtās tasthuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3000_0: atrāntare citragrīvo nāma kapotarājaḥ sahasra-parivāraḥ prāṇa-yātrārtha-paribhramaṃs
GK22vispancu:3000_1: tāṃs taṇḍulān dūrato 'pi paśyan laghupatanakena nivāryamāṇo 'pi jihvā-laulyād bhakṣaṇārtham apatat /
GK22vispancu:3007: paulastyaḥ katham anya-dāra-haraṇe doṣaṃ na vijñātavān
GK22vispancu:3009: akṣaiś cāpi yudhiṣṭhireṇa sahasā prāpto hy anarthaḥ kathaṃ
GK22vispancu:3014: atrāntare lubdhakas tān baddhān vijñāya prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prodyata-yaṣṭis tad-vadhārthaṃ pradhāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3015: citragrīvo 'py ātmānaṃ sa-parivāraṃ baddhaṃ matvā lubdhakam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān kapotān ūce-aho,
GK22vispancu:3017: vyasaneṣv eva sarveṣu yasya buddhir na hīyate /
GK22vispancu:3018: sa teṣāṃ pāram abhyeti tat-prabhāvād asaṃśayam //Panc_2.6//
GK22vispancu:3019: sampattau ca vipattau ca mahatām eka-rūpatā /
GK22vispancu:3020: udaye savitā rakto raktaś cāsta-maye tathā //Panc_2.7//
GK22vispancu:3021: tat sarve vayaṃ helayoḍḍīya sa-pāśa-jālā asyādarśanaṃ gatvā muktiṃ prāpnumaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3022: no ced bhaya-viklavāḥ santo helayā samutpātaṃ na kariṣyatha /
GK22vispancu:3024: tantavo 'py āyatā nityaṃ tantavo bahulāḥ samāḥ /
GK22vispancu:3025: bahūn bahutvād āyāsān sahantīty upamā satām //Panc_2.8//
GK22vispancu:3026: tathānuṣṭhite lubdhako jālam ādāyākāśe gacchatāṃ teṣāṃ pṛṣṭhato bhūmistho 'pi paryadhāvat /
GK22vispancu:3028: jālam ādāya gacchanti saṃhatāḥ pakṣiṇo 'py amī /
GK22vispancu:3029: yāvac ca vivadiṣyante patiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ //Panc_2.9//
GK22vispancu:3030: laghupatanako 'pi prāṇa-yātrā-kriyāṃ tyaktvā kim atra bhaviṣyantīti kutūhalāt tat-pṛṣṭhato 'nusarati /
GK22vispancu:3031: atha dṛṣṭer agocaratāṃ gatān vijñāya lubdhako nirāśaḥ ślokam apaṭhan nivṛttaś ca-
GK22vispancu:3032: nahi bhavati yan na bhāvyaṃ bhavati ca bhāvyaṃ vināpi yatnena /
GK22vispancu:3033: karatala-gatam api naśyati yasya hi bhavitavyatā nāsti //Panc_2.10//
GK22vispancu:3035: parāṅmukhe vidhau cet syāt kathañcid draviṇodayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3036: tat so 'nyad api saṅgṛhya yāti śaṅkha-nidhir yathā //Panc_2.11//
GK22vispancu:3037: tad āstāṃ tāvad vihaṅgāmiṣa-lobho yāvat kuṭumba-vartanopāya-bhūtaṃ jālam api me naṣṭam /
GK22vispancu:3038: citragrīvo 'pi lubdhakam adarśanībhūtaṃ jñātvā tān uvāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3040: tat sarvair api svasthair gamyatāṃ mahilāropyasya prāg-uttara-dig-bhāge /
GK22vispancu:3041: tatra mama suhṛd dhiraṇyako nāma mūṣakaḥ sarveṣāṃ pāśa-cchedaṃ kariṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3043: vāṅ-mātreṇāpi sāhāyyaṃ mitrād anyo na sandadhe //Panc_2.12//
GK22vispancu:3044: evaṃ te kapotāś citragrīveṇa sambodhitā mahilāropye nagare hiraṇyaka-bila-durgaṃ prāpuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3045: hiraṇyako 'pi sahasra-mukha-bila-durgaṃ praviṣṭaḥ sann akutobhayaḥ sukhenāsta /
GK22vispancu:3048: sarveṣāṃ jāyate vaśyo durga-hīnas tathā nṛpaḥ //Panc_2.13//
GK22vispancu:3050: na gajānāṃ sahasreṇa na ca lakṣeṇa vājinām /
GK22vispancu:3051: tat karma sidhyate rājñāṃ dureṇaikena yad raṇe //Panc_2.14//
GK22vispancu:3054: atha citragrīvo bilam āsādya tāra-svareṇa provāca-bho bho mitra hiraṇyaka /
GK22vispancu:3057: tac chrutvā hiraṇyako 'pi bila-durgāntargataḥ san provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3066: tad ākarṇya pulakita-tanuḥ prahṛṣṭātmā sthira-manās tvaramāṇo niṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3071: iṣṭā bhāryā sumitraṃ ca apūrvāṇi dine dine //Panc_2.17//
GK22vispancu:3073: citte ca tasya saukhyasya na kiñcit pratimaṃ sukham //Panc_2.18//
GK22vispancu:3074: atha citraṃ grīvaṃ saparivāraṃ pāśa-baddham ālokya hiraṇyakaḥ sa-viṣādam idam āha-bhoḥ, kim etat ?
GK22vispancu:3075: sa āha-bhoḥ, jānann api kiṃ pṛcchasi ?
GK22vispancu:3077: yasmāc ca yena ca yadā ca yathā ca yac ca
GK22vispancu:3078: yāvac ca yatra ca śubhāśubham ātma-karma /
GK22vispancu:3079: tasmāc ca tena ca tadā ca tathā ca tac ca
GK22vispancu:3080: tāvac ca tatra ca kṛtānta-vaśād upaiti //Panc_2.19//
GK22vispancu:3085: so 'pi pārśva-sthitaṃ daivād bandhanaṃ na ca paśyati //Panc_2.20//
GK22vispancu:3090: vidhir aho balavān iti me matiḥ //Panc_2.21//
GK22vispancu:3093: badhyante nipuṇair agādha-salilān mīnāḥ samudrād api /
GK22vispancu:3094: durnītaṃ kim ihāsti kiṃ ca sukṛtaṃ kaḥ sthāna-lābhe guṇaḥ
GK22vispancu:3095: kālaḥ sarva-janān prasārita-karo gṛhṇāti dūrād api //Panc_2.22//
GK22vispancu:3096: evam uktvā citragrīvasya pāśaṃ chettum udyataṃ sa tam āha-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:3107: tat katham etāvan-mātram api saṃmānaṃ na karomi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3108: yaḥ saṃmānaṃ sadā dhatte bhṛtyānāṃ kṣitipo 'dhikam /
GK22vispancu:3109: vittābhāve'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā te tyajanti na karhicit //Panc_2.23//
GK22vispancu:3111: viśvāsaḥ sampadāṃ mūlaṃ tena yūthapatir gajaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3113: aparaṃ mama kadācit pāśa-cchede kurvatas te danta-bhaṅgo bhavati /
GK22vispancu:3115: tan nūnaṃ naraka-pāta eva / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3116: sadācāreṣu bhṛtyeṣu saṃsīdatsu ca yaḥ prabhuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3117: sukhī syān narakaṃ yāti paratreha ca sīdati //Panc_2.25//
GK22vispancu:3122: bhavān apy anena bahu-kapota-parivāreṇa bhaviṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3123: kāruṇyaṃ saṃvibhāgaś ca yathā bhṛtyeṣu lakṣyate /
GK22vispancu:3125: evam uktvā sarveṣāṃ pāśa-cchedaṃ kṛtvā hiraṇyakaś citragrīvam āha-mitra,
GK22vispancu:3128: tān sampreṣya punar api durgaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3131: mitravān sādhayaty arthān duḥsādhyān api vai yataḥ /
GK22vispancu:3132: tasmān mitrāṇi kurvīta samānāny eva cātmanaḥ //Panc_2.27//
GK22vispancu:3133: laghupatanako 'pi vāyasaḥ sarvaṃ taṃ citragrīva-bandhu-mokṣam avalokya vismitamanā vyacintayat-aho buddhir asya hiraṇyakasya śaktiś ca durga-sāmagrī ca /
GK22vispancu:3135: ahaṃ ca na kasyacid viśvasimi cala-prakṛtiś ca /
GK22vispancu:3136: tadāpy enaṃ mitraṃ karomi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3139: evaṃ sampradhārya pādapād avatīrya bila-dvāram āśritya citragrīvavac chabdena hiraṇyakaṃ samāhūtavān-ehy ehi bho hiraṇyaka, ehi /
GK22vispancu:3140: tac chabdaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyako vyacintayat-kim anyo 'pi kaścit kapoto bandhana-śeṣas tiṣṭhati yena māṃ vyāharati /
GK22vispancu:3143: tac chrutvā viśeṣād antarlīno hiraṇyaka āha-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3145: vāyasa āha-ahaṃ tava pārśve guru-kāryeṇa samāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:3146: tat kiṃ na kriyate mayā saha darśanam ?
GK22vispancu:3147: hiraṇyaka āha-na me'sti tvayā saha saṅgamena prayojanam iti /
GK22vispancu:3148: sa āha-bhoḥ / citragrīvasya mayā tava sakāśāt pāśa-mokṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GK22vispancu:3150: tat kadācin mamāpi bandhane jāte tava pārśvān muktair bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:3154: tat kā tvayā saha mama maitrī ?
GK22vispancu:3157: yayor eva samaṃ vittaṃ yayor eva samaṃ kulam /
GK22vispancu:3158: tayor maitrī vivāhaś ca na tu puṣṭa-vipuṣṭayoḥ //Panc_2.29//
GK22vispancu:3160: yo mitraṃ kurute mūḍha ātmano 'sadṛśaṃ kudhīḥ /
GK22vispancu:3161: hīnaṃ vāpy adhikaṃ vāpi hāsyatāṃ yāty asau janaḥ //Panc_2.30//
GK22vispancu:3165: yadi tvaṃ maitrī na karoṣi tato 'haṃ prāṇa-mokṣaṇaṃ tavāgre kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:3168: tvayā vairiṇā saha kathaṃ maitrīṃ karomi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3169: vairiṇā na hi sandadhyāt suśliṣṭenāpi sandhinā /
GK22vispancu:3170: sutaptam api pānīyaṃ śamayaty eva pāvakam //Panc_2.31//
GK22vispancu:3177: tat sahaja-vairī tvam asmākam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3178: kṛtrimaṃ nāśam abhyeti vairaṃ drāk kṛtrimair guṇaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:3179: prāṇa-dānaṃ vinā vairaṃ sahajaṃ yāti na kṣayam //Panc_2.32//
GK22vispancu:3186: svābhāvikaṃ punaḥ katham api na gacchati /
GK22vispancu:3205: kāraṇān mitratām eti kāraṇād yāti śatrutām /
GK22vispancu:3206: tasmān mitratvam evātra yojyaṃ vairaṃ na dhīmatā //Panc_2.33//
GK22vispancu:3207: tasmāt kuru mayā saha samāgamaṃ mitra-dharmārtham /
GK22vispancu:3210: sakṛd duṣṭam apīṣṭaṃ yaḥ punaḥ sandhātum icchati /
GK22vispancu:3211: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā //Panc_2.34//
GK22vispancu:3214: etad api na sambhāvyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3215: siṃho vyākaraṇasya kartur aharat prāṇān piryān pāṇiner
GK22vispancu:3216: mīmāṃsā-kṛtam unmamātha sahasā hastī muniṃ jaiminim /
GK22vispancu:3222: bhayāl lobhāc ca mūrkhāṇāṃ maitrī syād darśanāt satām //Panc_2.36//
GK22vispancu:3223: mṛd-ghaṭa iva sukha-bhedyo duḥsandhānaś ca durjano bhavati /
GK22vispancu:3224: sujanas tu kanaka-ghaṭa iva durbhedaḥ sukara-sandhiś ca //Panc_2.37//
GK22vispancu:3225: ikṣor agrāt kramaśaḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi yathā rasa-viśeṣaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3228: ārambha-gurvī kṣayiṇī krameṇa laghvī purā vṛddhimatī ca paścāt /
GK22vispancu:3232: sa āha-na me'sti te śapathaiḥ pratyayaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3233: śapathaiḥ sandhitasyāpi na viśvāsaṃ vrajed ripoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3234: śrūyate śapathaṃ kṛtvā vṛtraḥ śakreṇa sūditaḥ //Panc_2.40//
GK22vispancu:3235: na viśvāsaṃ vinā śatrur devānām api sidhyati /
GK22vispancu:3238: bṛhaspater api prājñas tasmān naivātra viśvaset /
GK22vispancu:3239: ya icched ātmano buddhim āyuṣyaṃ ca sukhāni ca //Panc_2.42//

GK22vispancu:5140: śvetaṃ padaṃ śirasi yat tu śiroruhāṇāṃ
GK22vispancu:5141: sthānaṃ paraṃ paribhavasya tad eva puṃsām /
GK22vispancu:5145: gātraṃ saṅkucitaṃ gatir vigalitā dantāś ca nāśaṅgatā
GK22vispancu:5146: dṛṣṭir bhrāmyati rūpam apy upahataṃ vaktraṃ ca lālāyate /
GK22vispancu:5147: vākyaṃ naiva karoti bāndhava-janaḥ patnī na śuśrūṣate
GK22vispancu:5149: atha kadācit sā tena sahaikaśayane parāṅmukhī yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad gṛhe cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5150: sāpi taṃ cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaya-vyākulitā vṛddham api taṃ patiṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliliṅga /
GK22vispancu:5151: so 'pi vismayāt pulakāñcita-sarva-gātraś cintayāmāsa-aho kim eṣā mām adyāvagūhate ?
GK22vispancu:5152: yāvan nipuṇatayā paśyati tāvat gṛha-koṇaika-deśe cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-nūnam eṣāsya bhayān mām āliṅgati iti jñātvā taṃ cauram āha-yā mamodvijate (186) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5153: tac chrutvā cauro 'py āha-hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi (187) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5154: tasmāc caurasyāpy upakāraḥ śreyaś cintyate kiṃ punaḥ śaraṇāgatasya /
GK22vispancu:5155: api cāyaṃ tair viprakṛto 'smākam eva puṣṭaye bhaviṣyati tadīya-randhra-darśanāya ceti anena kāraṇenāyam avadhya iti /
GK22vispancu:5157: sāmpratam evaṃ sthite kiṃ karaṇīyam iti ?
GK22vispancu:5161: caureṇa jīvitaṃ dattaṃ rākṣasena tu go-yugam //Panc_3.190//
GK22vispancu:5166: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne daridro droṇa-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5170: tasya ca kenāpi yajamānenānukampayā śiśu-go-yugaṃ dattam /
GK22vispancu:5171: brāhmaṇena ca bāla-bhāvād ārabhya yācita-ghṛta-taila-yavasādibhiḥ saṃvardhya supuṣṭaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:5172: tac ca dṛṣṭvā sahasaiva kaścic cauraś cintitavān-aham asya brāhmaṇasya go-yugam idam apahariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5174: yāvat prasthitas tāvad ardha-mārge pravirala-tīkṣṇa-danta-paṅktir unnata-nāsā-vaṃśaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5177: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ tīvra-bhaya-trasto cauro 'bravīt-ko bhavān ? iti /
GK22vispancu:5178: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ krūra-karmā cauro daridra-brāhmaṇasya go-yugaṃ hartuṃ prasthito 'smi /
GK22vispancu:5181: atas tam eva brāhmaṇam adya bhakṣayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5182: atha tau tatra gatvaikānte kānlam anveṣayantau sthitau /
GK22vispancu:5183: prasupte ca brāhmaṇe tad-bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prasthitaṃ rākṣasaṃ dṛṣṭvā cauro 'bravīt-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:5184: naiṣanyāyo yato go-yuge mayāpahṛte paścāt tvam enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhakṣaya /
GK22vispancu:5185: so 'bravīt-kadācid ayaṃ brāhmaṇo go-śabdena budhyeta tadānarthako 'yaṃ mamārambhaḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:5186: cauro 'py abravīt-tavāpi yadi bhakṣaṇāyopasthitasya eko 'py antarāyaḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:5187: tadāham api na śaknomi go-yugam apahartum /
GK22vispancu:5188: ataḥ prathamaṃ mayāpahṛte go-yuge paścāt tvayā brāhmaṇo bhakṣitavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5189: itthaṃ cāham ahamikayā tayor vivadatoḥ samutpanne dvaidhe pratirava-vaśād brāhmaṇo jajāgāra /
GK22vispancu:5191: tvām evāyaṃ rākṣaso bhakṣayitum icchati iti /
GK22vispancu:5194: evaṃ śrutvotthāya brāhmaṇaḥ sāvadhāno bhūtveṣṭa-devatā-mantra-dhyānenātmānaṃ rākṣasād udgūrṇa-laguḍena caurād go-yugaṃ rarakṣa /
GK22vispancu:5197: atha tasya vacanam avadhāryārimardanaḥ punar api prākārakarṇam apṛcchat-kathaya,
GK22vispancu:5201: yato rakṣitenānena kadācit paraspara-prītyā kālaḥ sukhena gacchati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5202: parasparasya marmāṇi ye na rakṣanti jantavaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5208: asti kasmiṃścin nagare devaśaktir nāma rājā /
GK22vispancu:5209: tasya ca putro jaṭhara-valmīkāśrayeṇorageṇa pratidinaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ kṣīyate /
GK22vispancu:5210: anekopacāraiḥ sad-vaidyaiḥ sac-chāstropadiṣṭauṣadha-yuktyāpi cikitsyamāno na svāsthyam eti /
GK22vispancu:5212: kasmiṃścin nagare bhikṣāṭanaṃ kṛtvā mahati devālaye kālaṃ yāpayati /
GK22vispancu:5213: atha tatra nagare balir nāma rājāste /
GK22vispancu:5214: tasya ca dve duhitarau yauvana-sthe tiṣṭhataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5215: te ca pratidivasam ādityodaye pituḥ pādāntikam āgatya namaskāraṃ cakratuḥ /
GK22vispancu:5221: enāṃ duṣṭa-bhāṣiṇīṃ kumārikāṃ kasyacid vaideśikasya prayacchata tena nija-vihitam iyam eva bhuṅkte /
GK22vispancu:5222: atha tatheti pratipadyālpa-parivārā sā kumārikā mantribhis tasya deva-kulāśrita-rāja-putrasya pratipāditā /
GK22vispancu:5223: sāpi prahṛṣṭa-manasā taṃ patiṃ devavat pratipadyādāya cānya-viṣayaṃ gatā /
GK22vispancu:5224: tataḥ kasmiṃścid dūratara-nagara-pradeśe taḍāga-taṭe rāja-putram āvāsa-rakṣāyai nirūpya svayaṃ ca ghṛta-taila-lavaṇa-taṇḍulādi-kraya-nimittaṃ sa-parivārā gatā /
GK22vispancu:5225: kṛtvā ca kraya-vikrayaṃ yāvad āgacchati tāvat sa rāja-putro valmīkopari kṛta-mūrdhā prasuptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5226: tasya ca mukhād bhujagaḥ phaṇāṃ niṣkāsya vāyum aśnāti /
GK22vispancu:5227: tatraiva ca valmīke'paraḥ sarpo niṣkramya tathaivāsīt /
GK22vispancu:5228: atha tayoḥ paraspara-darśanena krodha-saṃrakta-locanayor madhyād valmīkasthena sarpeṇoktam-bho bho durātman /
GK22vispancu:5231: tvayāpi durātmanāsya valmīkasya madhye katham idaṃ dūṣitaṃ hāṭaka-pūrṇaṃ kalaśa-yugalam ity evaṃ parasparasya marmāṇy udghāṭitavantau /
GK22vispancu:5233: bheṣajam idaṃ te kiṃ ko 'pi na jānāti yaj jīrṇotkālita-kāñjikā-rājikā-pānena bhavān vināśam upayāti /
GK22vispancu:5234: athodarastho 'hir abravīt-tavāpy etad bheṣajaṃ kiṃ kaścid api na vetti yad uṣṇa-tailena mahoṣṇodakena vā tava vināśaḥ syād iti /
GK22vispancu:5235: evaṃ ca sā rāja-kanyā viṭapāntaritā tayoḥ parasparālāpān marma-mayān ākarṇya tathaivānuṣṭhitavatī /
GK22vispancu:5236: vidhāya vyaṅgaṃ nīrogaṃ bhartāraṃ nidhiṃ ca paramam āsādya svadeśābhimukhaṃ prāyāt /
GK22vispancu:5240: tac ca śrutvā svayam arirdano 'py evaṃ samarthitavān /
GK22vispancu:5243: vināśito 'yaṃ bhavadbhir anyāyena svāmī / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5244: apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā /
GK22vispancu:5245: trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam //Panc_3.192//
GK22vispancu:5247: pratyakṣe'pi kṛte pāpe mūrkhaḥ sāmnā praśāmyati /
GK22vispancu:5253: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vīravaro nāma rathakāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:5256: so 'pi tasyāḥ parīkṣaṇārthaṃ vyacintayat-atha mayāsyāḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ kartavyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5257: yadi syāt pāvakaḥ śītaḥ proṣṇī vā śaśa-lāñchanaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5258: strīṇāṃ tadā satītvaṃ syād yadi syād durjano hitaḥ //Panc_3.194//
GK22vispancu:5259: jānāmi caināṃ loka-vacanād asatīm / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5260: yac ca vedeṣu śāstreṣu na dṛṣṭaṃ na ca saṃśrutam /
GK22vispancu:5261: tat sarvaṃ vetti loko 'yaṃ yat syād brahmāṇḍa-madhyagam //Panc_3.195//
GK22vispancu:5265: tat tvayā kim api pātheyaṃ mama yogyaṃ vidheyam /
GK22vispancu:5267: autsukyāt sarva-kāryāṇi santyajya siddham annaṃ ghṛta-śarkarā-prāyam akarot /
GK22vispancu:5271: athāsau pratyūṣe utthāya sva-gṛhān nirgataḥ sāpi taṃ prasthitaṃ vijñāya prahasita-vadanāṅga-saṃskāraṃ kurvāṇā kathañcit taṃ divasam atyavāhayat /
GK22vispancu:5272: atha pūrva-paricita-viṭa-gṛhe gatvā taṃ pratyuktavatī-sa durātmā me patir grāmāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5274: tathānuṣṭhite sa rathakāro 'raṇye dinam ativāhya pradoṣe sva-gṛhe'padvāreṇa praviśya śayyādhas-tale nibhṛto bhūtvā sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5275: etasminn antare sa devadattaḥ samāgatya tatra śayane upaviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5276: dṛṣṭvā roṣāviṣṭa-citto rathakāro vyacintayat-kim enam utthāya hanmi ?
GK22vispancu:5277: athavā helayaiva prasuptau dvāv apy etau vyāpādayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:5280: atrāntare sā gṛha-dvāraṃ nibhṛtaṃ pidhāya śayana-talam ārūḍhā /
GK22vispancu:5282: tataḥ sā vyacintayat-nūnam etena durātmanā rathakāreṇa mat-parīkṣaṇārthaṃ bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:5284: evaṃ tasyāś cintayanyā sa devadattaḥ sparśotsuko babhūva /
GK22vispancu:5286: na me śarīraṃ tvayā sparśanīyaṃ yato 'haṃ pativratā mahāsatī ca /
GK22vispancu:5287: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā tvāṃ bahsmasātkariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5288: sa āha-yady evaṃ tarhi tvayā kim aham āhūtaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5290: aham adya pratyūṣe devatā-darśanārthaṃ caṇḍkāyatanaṃ gatā tatrākasmāt khe vāṇī sañjātā-putri kiṃ karomi ?
GK22vispancu:5296: tad asti kaścid upāyo yena me patiḥ śata-saṃvatsara-jīvī bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:5301: yadi tan mama prāṇair bhavati tad ādeśaya yena karomi /
GK22vispancu:5302: atha devyābhihitam-yady adya para-puruṣeṇa sahaikasmin śayane samāruhyāliṅganaṃ karoṣi tat tava bhartṛ-sakto 'pamṛtyus tasya sañcarati /
GK22vispancu:5305: tad yat kiñcit kartu-manās tat kuruṣva /
GK22vispancu:5306: na hi devatā-vacanam anyathā bhaviṣyatīti niścayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5308: so 'pi rathakāro mūrkhas tasyās tad-vacanam ākarṇya pulakāñcita-tanuḥ śayyādhastalān niṣkramya tām uvāca-sādhu pativrate /
GK22vispancu:5310: ahaṃ durjana-vacana-śaṅkita-hṛdayas tvat-parīkṣā-nimittaṃ grāmāntara-vyājaṃ kṛtvā khaṭvādhas-tale nibhṛtaṃ līnaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5314: yad āyur buddhi-kṛte'pamṛtyu-vināśārthaṃ catvam evaṃ kṛtavatī /
GK22vispancu:5316: sva-skandhe tām āropya tām api devadattam uvāca-bho mahānubhāva /
GK22vispancu:5319: tat tvam api mām āliṅgya mat-skandhe samāroha iti jalpann anicchantam api devadattam āliṅgya balāt svakīya-skandhe āropitavān /
GK22vispancu:5320: tataś ca nṛtyaṃ kṛtvā-he brahma-vrata-dharāṇāṃ dhurīṇa /
GK22vispancu:5321: tvayāpi mayy upakṛtam ity ādy uktvā skandhād uttārya yatra yatra svajana-gṛha-dvārādiṣu babhrāma tatra tatra tayor ubhayor api tad-guṇa-varṇanam akarot /
GK22vispancu:5323: tat sarvathā mūlotkhātā vayaṃ vinaṣṭāḥ smaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5329: aprājñān mantriṇaḥ prāpya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //Panc_3.198//
GK22vispancu:5330: tatas tad-vaco 'nādṛtya sarve te sthirajīvinam utkṣipya sva-durgam ānetum ārabdhāḥ /
GK22vispancu:5333: yat kāraṇam icchāmi dīptaṃ vahnim anupraveṣṭum /
GK22vispancu:5336: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ tāvad yuṣmad-artham imām āpadaṃ meghavarṇena prāpitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5337: tad icchāmi teṣāṃ vaira-yātanārtham ulūkatvam iti /
GK22vispancu:5338: tac ca śrutvā rājanīti-kuśalo raktākṣaḥ prāha-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:5340: tāvad ulūka-yoni-gato 'pi svakīyām eva vāyasa-yoniṃ bahu manyase /
GK22vispancu:5342: sūryaṃ bhartāram utsṛjya parjanyaṃ mārutaṃ girim /
GK22vispancu:5348: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne śālaṅkāyano nāma tapodhano jāhnavyāṃ snānārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5349: tasya ca sūryopasthānaṃ kurvatas tatra pradeśe mūṣikā kācit kharatara-nakhāgra-puṭena śyenena gṛhītā /
GK22vispancu:5350: dṛṣṭvā sa muniḥ karuṇārdra-hṛdayo muñca muñceti kurvāṇas tasyopari pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍaṃ prākṣipat /
GK22vispancu:5351: so 'pi pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍa-prahāra-vyākulendriyo bhraṣṭa-mūṣiko bhūmau nipapāta mūṣikāpi bhaya-trastā kartavyam ajānantī rakṣa rakṣeti jalpantī muni-caraṇāntikam upāviśat /
GK22vispancu:5354: na yuktam anuṣṭhitaṃ bhavatā yad ahaṃ pāṣāṇena tāḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5358: iti bruvāṇaṃ śyenaṃ provāca saḥ-bho vihaṅgādhama /
GK22vispancu:5367: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ vidhinā sṛṣṭiṃ kurvatāhāro 'pi vinirmitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5368: tato yathā bhavatām annaṃ tathāsmākaṃ mūṣikādayo vihitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:5369: tat svāhāra-kāṅkṣiṇaṃ māṃ kiṃ dūṣayasi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5370: yady asya vihitaṃ bhojyaṃ na tat tasya praduṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5371: abhakṣye bahu-doṣaḥ syāt tasmāt kāryo na vyatyayaḥ //Panc_3.200//
GK22vispancu:5372: bhakṣyaṃ yathā dvijātīnāṃ madyapānāṃ yathā haviḥ /
GK22vispancu:5373: abhakṣyaṃ bhakṣyatām eti tathānyeṣām api dvija //Panc_3.201//
GK22vispancu:5374: bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣyatāṃ śreya abhakṣyaṃ tu mahad agham /
GK22vispancu:5375: tat kathaṃ māṃ vṛthācāra tvaṃ daṇḍayitum arhasi //Panc_3.202//
GK22vispancu:5376: aparaṃ munīnāṃ na caiṣa dharmo yatas tair dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam aśrutam alaulyatvam aśatrutvaṃ praśasyate / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5377: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5379: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate //Panc_3.203//
GK22vispancu:5381: yogī yuñjīta satataṃ satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ //Panc_3.204/
GK22vispancu:5382: tat tvam anena karmaṇā bhraṣṭa-tapāḥ sañjātaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5383: muñca muñca pataty eko mā muñceti dvitīyakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5389: kasmiṃścid nadī-taṭa ekata-dvita-tritābhidhānās trayo 'pi bhrātaro munayas tapaḥ kurvanti /
GK22vispancu:5390: teṣāṃ ca tapaḥ-prabhāvād ākāśasthā dhauta-potikā nirālambā jalārdrā bhū-sparśana-bhayena snāna-samaye tiṣṭhanti /
GK22vispancu:5391: athānye-dyur mamaiva kācin maṇḍūkikā kenāpi gṛdhreṇa balena nītā /
GK22vispancu:5392: atha tāṃ gṛhītā vilokya teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhena karuṇārdra-hṛdayena bhavateva vyāhṛtaṃ-muñca muñceti /
GK22vispancu:5394: tāṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyena tad-bhayārtena mā muñcety abhihitaṃ yāvat tasyāpi papāta /
GK22vispancu:5395: tatas tṛtīyo dvayor api dhauta-potikāṃ bhūmau patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva /
GK22vispancu:5397: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-muñca muñca pataty eka ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5398: tac chrutvā munir vihasyāha-bho mūrkha vihaṅgama /
GK22vispancu:5400: yataḥ kṛta-yuge pāpālāpato 'pi pāpaṃ jāyate tena dhauta-potike patite aśiṣṭālāpena na sad-apavacana-doṣataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5403: tat karma kṛtaṃ vinā pāpaṃ na lagati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5405: kalau tu pāpa-saṃyukte yaḥ karoti sa lipyate //Panc_3.206//
GK22vispancu:5407: āsanāc chayanād yānāt saṃgateś cāpi bhojanāt /
GK22vispancu:5412: atha gate śyene mūṣikayā sa munir abhihitaḥ-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:5414: no ced anyo duṣṭa-pakṣī māṃ vyāpādayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5415: tad ahaṃ tatraivāśrame tvad-dattānnāhāra-muṣṭyā kālaṃ neṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5416: so 'pi dākṣiṇyavān sa-karuṇo vyacintayat-kathaṃ mayā mūṣikā haste dhṛtvā neyā jana-hāsya-kāriṇī /
GK22vispancu:5419: tathānuṣṭhite kanyā-sahitaṃ munim avalokya patnī papraccha-bhagavan /
