GK22vispancu:6082: so 'py āha-kva te āśrayo vāpyāṃ kūpe taḍāge hrade vā /
GK22vispancu:6090: yac chakyaṃ grasituṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat /
GK22vispancu:6091: hitaṃ ca pariṇāme yat tad ādyaṃ bhūtim icchatā //Panc_4.23//
GK22vispancu:6094: ahaṃ sukhopāyena tatra tava praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6095: tathā tasya madhye jalopānte ramyataraṃ koṭaram asti /
GK22vispancu:6096: tatra sthitas tvaṃ līlayā dāyādān vyāpādayiṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:6097: tac chrutvā sarpo vyacintayat-ahaṃ tāvat pariṇata-vayāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6099: tat sukhāvaho jīvanopāyo 'yam anena kulāṅgāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6100: tad gatvā tān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayāmi iti /
GK22vispancu:6103: sa hi sarva-sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim āracayed budhaḥ //Panc_4.24//
GK22vispancu:6109: sthānaṃ ca darśayiṣyāmi ta eva bhakṣaṇīyāḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:6110: sarpa āha-sāmprataṃ tvaṃ me mitraṃ jātam /
GK22vispancu:6113: evam uktvā bilān niṣkramya tam āliṅgya ca tenaiva saha prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6114: atha kūpam āsādyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikā-mārgeṇa sarpas tenātmanā svālayaṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6117: tat sāmpratam anenaiva ghaṭikā-yantra-mārgeṇa gamyatām iti /
GK22vispancu:6122: tasmād atra-sthasya me maṇḍūkam ekaikaṃ sva-vargīyaṃ prayaccha /
GK22vispancu:6123: no cet sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyāmi iti /
GK22vispancu:6124: tac chrutvā gaṅgadatto vyākula-manā vyācintayat-aho kim etan mayā kṛtaṃ sarpam ānayatā /
GK22vispancu:6125: tad yadi niṣedhayiṣyāmi tat sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6128: sa karoti na sandehaḥ svayaṃ hi viṣa-bhakṣaṇam //Panc_4.25//
GK22vispancu:6129: tat prayacchāmy asyaikaikaṃ pratidinaṃ suhṛdam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6139: ardhena kurute kāryaṃ sarva-nāśo hi dustaraḥ //Panc_4.28//
GK22vispancu:6140: na svalpasya kṛte bhūri nāśayen matimān naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:6141: etad eva hi pāṇḍityaṃ yat svalpād bhūri-rakṣaṇam //Panc_4.29//
GK22vispancu:6143: so 'pi taṃ bhakṣayitvā tasya parokṣe'nyān api bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:6145: yathā hi malinair vastrair yatra tatropaviśyate /
GK22vispancu:6146: evaṃ calita-vittas tu vitta-śeṣaṃ na rakṣati //Panc_4.30//
GK22vispancu:6147: athānya-dine tenāparān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayitvā gaṅgadatta-suto yamunādatto bhakṣitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6148: taṃ bhakṣitaṃ matvā gaṅgadattas tāra-svareṇa dhig dhik pralāpa-paraḥ kathañcid api na virarāma /
GK22vispancu:6151: sva-pakṣasya kṣaye jāte ko nas trātā bhaviṣyati //Panc_4.31//
GK22vispancu:6152: tad adyāpi vicintyatām ātmano niṣkramaṇam asya vadhopāyaś ca /
GK22vispancu:6153: atha gacchatā kālena sakalam api kavalitaṃ maṇḍūka-kulam /
GK22vispancu:6158: tad dīyatāṃ me kiñcid bhojanaṃ yato 'haṃ tvayātrānītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6160: na tvayātra viṣaye mayāvasthitena kāpi cintā kāryā /
GK22vispancu:6161: tad yadi māṃ preṣayati tato 'nya-kūpa-sthān api maṇḍūkān viśvāsyātrānayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6162: sa āha-mama tāvat tvam abhakṣyo bhrātṛ-sthāne /
GK22vispancu:6163: tad yady evaṃ karoṣi tat sāmprataṃ pitṛ-sthāne bhavasi /
GK22vispancu:6165: so 'pi tad ākarṇyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikām āśritya vividha-devatopakalpita-pūjopayācitas tat-kūpād viniṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6167: atha cirād anāgate gaṅgadatte priyadarśano 'nya-koṭara-nivāsinīṃ godhām uvāca-bhadre /
GK22vispancu:6170: tad gatvā tat-sakāśaṃ kutracij jalāśaye'nviṣya mama sandeśaṃ kathaya /
GK22vispancu:6171: yenāgamyatām ekākināpi bhavatā drutataraṃ yady anye maṇḍūkā nāgacchanti /
GK22vispancu:6172: ahaṃ tvayā vinā nātra vastuṃ śaknomi /
GK22vispancu:6173: tathā yady ahaṃ tava viruddham ācarāmi tat sukṛtam antare mayā vidhṛtam /
GK22vispancu:6174: godhāpi tad-vacanād gaṅgadattaṃ drutataram anviṣyāha-bhadra gaṅgadatta /
GK22vispancu:6175: sa tava suhṛt-priyadarśanas tava mārgaṃ samīkṣamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6177: aparaṃ ca tena tava virūpa-karaṇe sukṛtam antare dhṛtam /
GK22vispancu:6187: aham api gaṅgadatta iva tvad-gṛhe na kathañcid api yāsyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6192: dṛṣṭvāpāyo 'pi svayam eva tatra gatvātmānaṃ vyāpādayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6193: āgataś ca gataś caiva gatvā yaḥ punar āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6202: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe karāla-kesaro nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6203: tasya ca dhūsarako nāma śṛgālaḥ sadaivānuyāyī paricārako 'sti /
GK22vispancu:6204: atha kadācit tasya hastinā saha yudhyamānasya śarīre gurutarāḥ prahārāḥ sañjātāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6205: yaiḥ padam ekam api calituṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:6206: tasyācalanāc ca dhūsarakaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho daurbalyaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6209: padāt padam api calituṃ na śaknomi /
GK22vispancu:6214: tad ākarṇya śṛgālo 'nveṣayan kañcit samīpa-vartinaṃ grāmam āsāditavān /
GK22vispancu:6215: tatra lambakarṇo nāma gardabhas taḍāgopānte pravirala-dūrvāṅkurān kṛcchrād āsvādayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6219: tat kathaya kim evaṃ durbalatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6227: yady evaṃ tad asti marakata-sadṛśa-śaṣpa-prāyo nadī-sanātho ramaṇīyataraḥ pradeśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6228: tatrāgatya mayā saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavaṃs tiṣṭha /
GK22vispancu:6236: tatrāsti na kaścid aparasya tatra praveśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6237: paramam anenaiva doṣeṇa rajaka-kadarthitās tatra tisro rāsabhyo 'nāthāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:6238: tāś ca puṣṭim āpannā yauvanotkaṭā idaṃ mām ūcuḥ-yadi tvam asmākaṃ satyo mātulas tadā kaṃcid grāmāntaraṃ gatvāsmad-yogyaṃ kaścit patim ānaya /
GK22vispancu:6240: atha śṛgāla-vacanāni śrutvā kāma-pīḍitāṅgas tam avocat-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:6243: nāmṛtaṃ na viṣaṃ kiñcid ekāṃ muktvā nitambinīm /
GK22vispancu:6244: yasyāḥ saṅgena jīvyeta mriyate ca viyogataḥ //Panc_4.34//
GK22vispancu:6246: yāsāṃ nāmnāpi kāmaḥ syāt saṅgamaṃ darśanaṃ vinā /
GK22vispancu:6247: tāsāṃ dṛk-saṅgamaṃ prāpya yan na dravati kautukam //Panc_4.35//
GK22vispancu:6249: siṃho 'pi vyathākulitas taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāvat samuttiṣṭhati tāvad rāsabhaḥ palāyitum ārabdhavān /
GK22vispancu:6250: atha tasya palāyamānasya siṃhena tala-prahāro dattaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6251: sa ca manda-bhāgyasya vyavasāya iva vyarthatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6254: yad gardabho 'pi tava purato balād gacchati /
GK22vispancu:6255: tat kathaṃ gajena saha yuddhaṃ kariṣyasi ?
GK22vispancu:6261: śṛgāla āha-adyāpy eka-vāraṃ tavāntike tam āneṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6264: yo māṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā gataḥ sa punaḥ katham atrāgamiṣyati ?
GK22vispancu:6265: tad anyat kim api sattvam anviṣyatām /
GK22vispancu:6270: atha śṛgālaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāsabhaḥ prāha-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6273: tat kathaya kiṃ tat sattvaṃ yasyātiraudra-vajra-sadṛśa-kara-prahārād ahaṃ muktaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6275: rāsabhī tvām āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā sānurāgam āliṅgituṃ samutthitā /
GK22vispancu:6277: sā punar na śaktā tvāṃ vinā sthātum /
GK22vispancu:6278: tayā tu naśatas te'valambanārthaṃ hastaḥ kṣiptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6282: etad vadati-yal lambakarṇo yadi me bhartā na bhavati tad aham agnau jalaṃ vā praviśāmi /
GK22vispancu:6283: punas tasya viyogaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknomi iti /
GK22vispancu:6286: aparaṃ bhagavān kāma-kopaṃ tavopari kariṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6288: te mūḍhāḥ pravihāya yānti kudhiyo mithyā-phalānveṣiṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6289: te tenaiva nihatya nirdayataraṃ nagnīkṛtā muṇḍitāḥ
GK22vispancu:6290: kecid rakta-paṭīkṛtāś ca jaṭilāḥ kāpālikāś cāpare //Panc_4.36//
GK22vispancu:6291: athāsau tad-vacanaṃ śraddheyatayā śrutvā bhūyo 'pi tena saha prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6293: jānann api naro daivāt prakaroti vigarhitam /
GK22vispancu:6294: karma kiṃ kasyacil loke garhitaṃ rocate katham //Panc_4.37//
GK22vispancu:6295: atrāntare sajjita-krameṇa siṃhena sa lambakarṇo vyāpāditaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6296: tatas taṃ hatvā śṛgālaṃ rakṣakaṃ nirūpya svayaṃ snānārthaṃ nadyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6298: atrāntare siṃho yāvat snātvā kṛte devārcanaḥ pratarpita-pitṛ-gaṇaḥ samāyāti tāvat karṇa-hṛdaya-rahito rāsabhas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6299: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kopa-parītātmā siṃhaḥ śṛgālam āha-pāpa /
GK22vispancu:6306: atha tvad-vacanaṃ śraddheyaṃ matvā siṃhas tenaiva saṃvibhajya niḥśaṅkita-manās taṃ bhakṣitavān /
GK22vispancu:6308: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-āgataś ca gataś caiva iti /
GK22vispancu:6313: svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī satyaṃ brūte sumanda-dhīḥ /
GK22vispancu:6314: sa svārthād bhraśyate nūnaṃ yudhiṣṭhira ivāparaḥ //Panc_4.38//
GK22vispancu:6320: sa kadācit pramādād ardha-magna-kharpara-tīkṣṇāgrasyopari mahatā vegena dhāvan patitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6321: tataḥ khapara-koṭyā pāṭita-lalāī̀oo rudhira-plāvita-tanuḥ kṛcchrād utthāya svāśrayaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6322: tataś cāpathya-sevanāt sa prahāras tasya karālatāṃ gataḥ kṛcchreṇa nīrogatāṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6323: atha kadācid durbhikṣa-pīḍite deśe ca kumbhakāraḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhaḥ kaiścid rāja-sevakaiḥ saha deśāntaraṃ gatvā kasyāpi rājñaḥ sevako babhūva /
GK22vispancu:6324: so 'pi rājā tasya lalāṭe vikarālaṃ prahāra-kṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayāmāsa,
GK22vispancu:6327: atas taṃ samānādibhiḥ sarveṣāṃ rāja-putrāṇāṃ madhye viśeṣa-prasādena paśyati sma /
GK22vispancu:6328: te'pi rāja-putrās tasya taṃ prasādātirekaṃ paśyantaṃ paramerṣyā-dharmaṃ vahanto rāja-bhayān na kiñcid ūcuḥ /
GK22vispancu:6329: athānyasminn ahani tasya bhūpater vīra-sambhāvanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ vigrahe samupasthite prakalpyamāneṣu gajeṣu saṃnahyamāneṣu vājiṣu yodheṣu /
GK22vispancu:6330: praguṇīkriyamāṇeṣu tena bhūbhujā sa kumbhakāraḥ prastāvānugataṃ pṛṣṭo nirjane-bho rāja-putra /
GK22vispancu:6331: kiṃ te nāma ? kā ca jātiḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6332: kasmin saṅgrāme prahāro 'yaṃ te lalāṭe lagnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6336: atha kadācin madya-pānaṃ kṛtvā nirgataḥ pradhāvan kharparopari patitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6337: tasya prahāra-vikāro 'yaṃ me lalāṭe evaṃ vikarālatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6338: tad ākarṇya rājā sa-vrīḍam āha-aho vañcito 'haṃ rājāputrānukāriṇānena kulālena /
GK22vispancu:6344: śūdraś ca kṛta-vighnaś ca darśanīyo 'si putraka /
GK22vispancu:6345: yasmin kule tvam utpanno gajas tatra na hanyate //Panc_4.39//
GK22vispancu:6352: siṃho 'pi nityam eva mṛgān vyāpādya siṃhyai dadāti /
GK22vispancu:6353: athānyasmin ahani tena kim api nāsāditam /
GK22vispancu:6354: yena bhramato 'pi tasya ravir astaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6355: atha tena sva-gṛham āgacchatā śṛgāla-śiśuḥ prāptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6356: sa ca bālako 'yam ity avadhārya yatnena daṃṣṭrāmadhya-gataṃ kṛtvā siṃhyā jīvantam eva samarpitavān /
GK22vispancu:6360: mayādyainaṃ śṛgāla-śiśuṃ parityajya na kiñcit sattvam āsāditam /
GK22vispancu:6361: sa ca mayā bālo 'yam iti matvā na vyāpādito viśeṣāt svajātīyaś ca / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6364: idānīṃ tvam enaṃ bhakṣayitvā pathyaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:6367: tvayā bālako 'yam iti vicintya na hataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6368: tat katham enam ahaṃ svodarārthe vināśayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6370: na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //Panc_4.41//
GK22vispancu:6372: ity evam uktvā tam api svastana-kṣīreṇa parāṃ puṣṭim anayat /
GK22vispancu:6373: evaṃ te trayo 'pi śiśavaḥ parasparam ajñāta-jāti-viśeṣā ekācāra-vihārā bālya-samayaṃ nirvāhayanti /
GK22vispancu:6374: atha kadācit tatra vane bhramann araṇya-gajaḥ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6375: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau siṃha-sutau dvāv api kupitānanau taṃ prati pracalitau yāvat tāvat tena śṛgāla-sutenābhihitam-aho /
GK22vispancu:6382: sotsāhaṃ jāyate sainyaṃ bhagne bhaṅgam avāpnuyāt //Panc_4.42//
GK22vispancu:6384: ata eva vāñchanti bhūpā yodhān mahābalān /
GK22vispancu:6385: śūrān vīrān kṛtotsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān //Panc_4.43//
GK22vispancu:6386: atha tau dvāv api gṛhaṃ prāpya pitror agrato jyeṣṭha-bhrātṛ-ceṣṭitam ūcatuḥ-yathā gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrato 'pi naṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6387_0: so 'pi tad ākarṇya kopāviṣṭa-manāḥ prasphuritādhara-pallavas tāmralocanas triśikhāṃ
GK22vispancu:6387_1: bhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā tau nirbhartsayan paruṣatara-vacanāny uvāca-tataḥ siṃhyai kānte nītvā
GK22vispancu:6390: athāsau prabhūta-kopāviṣṭas tām uvāca-kim aham etābhyāṃ śauryeṇa rūpeṇa vidyābhyāsena kauśalena vā hīnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6393: tad ākarṇya siṃhī tasya jīvitam icchanty antar vihasya prāha-tat samyak śṛṇu /
GK22vispancu:6396: tad yāvad etau mat-putrau śiśutvāt tvāṃ śṛgālaṃ na jānītaḥ,
GK22vispancu:6397: tāvad drutataraṃ gatvā svajātīyānāṃ madhye bhava /
GK22vispancu:6398: no ced ābhyāṃ hato mṛtyu-pathaṃ sameṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:6399: so 'pi tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā bhaya-vyākula-manāḥ śanaiḥ śanair apasṛtya sva-jātyā militaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6400: tasmāt tvaṃ api yāvad ete rāja-putrās tvāṃ kulālaṃ najānanti,
GK22vispancu:6402: no ced eteṣāṃ sakāśād viḍambanāṃ prāpya mariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6405: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī (38) iti /
GK22vispancu:6407: yat tvayā striyo 'rtha etat-kāryam anuṣṭhātum ārabdham /
GK22vispancu:6408: na hi strīṇāṃ kathañcid viśvāsam upagacchet / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6409: yad-arthe sva-kulaṃ tyaktaṃ jīvitārdhaṃ ca hāritam /
GK22vispancu:6410: sā māṃ tyajati niḥsnehā kaḥ strīṇāṃ viśvasen naraḥ //Panc_4.44//
GK22vispancu:6417: so 'pi pratidinaṃ kuṭumbena saha kalahaṃ kurvāṇā na viśrāmyati /
GK22vispancu:6418: so 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ kalaham asahamāno bhāryā-vātsalyāt sva-kuṭumbaṃ parityajya brāhmaṇyā saha viprakṛṣṭaṃ deśāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6422: athāsau tad-vacanānantaraṃ yāvad-udakaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchati tāvat tāṃ mṛtām apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:6423: ativallabhatayā viṣādaṃ kurvan yāvad vilapati tāvad ākāśe vācaṃ śṛṇoti /
GK22vispancu:6424: yathā hi-yadi brāhmaṇa tvaṃ svakīya-jīvitasyārdhaṃ dadāsi tatas te jīvati brāhmaṇī /
GK22vispancu:6425: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇena śucībhūya tisṛbhir vācobhiḥ svajīvitārdhaṃ dattam /
GK22vispancu:6426: vāk-samam eva ca brāhmaṇī jīvitā sā /
GK22vispancu:6427: atha tau jalaṃ pītvā vana-phalāni bhakṣayitvā gantum ārabdhau /
GK22vispancu:6428: tataḥ krameṇa kasyacin nagarasya pradeśe puṣpa-vāṭikāṃ praviśya brāhmaṇo bhāryām abhihitavān-bhadre,
GK22vispancu:6429: yāvad ahaṃ bhojanaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchāmi tāvad atra tvayā sthātavyam /
GK22vispancu:6431: atha tasyāṃ puṣpa-vāṭikāyāṃ paṅgura ara-ghaṭṭaṃ khelayan divya-girā gītam udgirati /
GK22vispancu:6432: tac ca śrutvā kusumeṣuṇārditā brāhmaṇyā tat-sakāśaṃ gatvābhihitam-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:6437: avaśyaṃ tvayā saha mayā saṅgamaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6439: suratānantaraṃ sābravīt-itaḥ-prabhṛti yāvaj-jīvaṃ mayātmā bhavate dattaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6440: iti jñātvā bhavān apy asmābhiḥ sahāgacchatu /
GK22vispancu:6442: atha brāhmaṇo bhojanaṃ gṛhītvā samāgatya tayā sahabhoktum ārabdhaḥ sābravīt-eṣa paṅgur bubhukṣitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6443: tad etasyāpi kiyantam api grāsaṃ dehi iti /
GK22vispancu:6448: so 'bravīt-na śaknomy ātmānam apy ātmanāṃ voḍhum /
GK22vispancu:6452: tathānuṣṭhite'nyasmin dine kūpopakaṇṭhe viśrānto brāhmaṇas tayā ca paṅgu-puruṣāsaktayā samprerya kūpāntaḥ pātitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6453: sāpi paṅguṃ gṛhītvā kasmiṃścin nagare praviṣṭā /
GK22vispancu:6454: tatra śulka-caurya-rakṣā-nimittaṃ rāja-puruṣair itas tato bhramadbhis tan-mastaka-sthā peṭī dṛṣṭā balād ācchidya rājāgre nītā /
GK22vispancu:6455: rājā ca yāvat tām udghāṭayati tāvat taṃ paṅguṃ dadarśa /
GK22vispancu:6456: tataḥ sā brāhmaṇī vilāpaṃ kurvatī rāja-puruṣānupadam eva tatrāgatā /
GK22vispancu:6458: sābravīt-mamaiṣa bhartā vyādhi-bādhito dāyāda-samūhair udvejito mayā sneha-vyākulita-mānasayā śirasi kṛtvā bhavadīya-nagara ānītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6461: grāma-dvayaṃ gṛhītvā bhartā saha bhogān bhuñjānā sukhena tiṣṭha /
GK22vispancu:6462: atha sa brāhmaṇo daiva-vaśāt kenāpi sādhunā kūpād uttāritaḥ paribhramaṃs tad eva nagaram āyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6467: anayā mama saktaṃ kiñcit gṛhītam asti /
GK22vispancu:6470: yat tvayāsya saktaṃ kiñcit gṛhītam asti tat samarpaya /
GK22vispancu:6473: brāhmaṇa āha-yan mayā trivācikaṃ sva-jīvitārdhaṃ dattam, tad dehi /
GK22vispancu:6474: atha sā rāja-bhayāt tatraiva trivācikam eva jīvitārdham anena dattam iti jalpantī prāṇair vimuktā /
GK22vispancu:6479: vānaraḥ punar āha-sādhu cedam upākhyānakaṃ śrūyate-
GK22vispancu:6480: na kiṃ dadyān na kiṃ kuryāt strībhir abhyarthito naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:6481: anaśvā yatra hreṣante śiraḥ parvaṇi muṇḍitam //Panc_4.45//
GK22vispancu:6485: atiprakhyāta-bala-pauruṣo 'neka-narendra-mukuṭa-marīci-jāla-jaṭilī-kṛta-pāda-pīṭhaḥ śarac-chaśāṅka-kiraṇa-nirmala-yaśāḥ samudra-paryantāyāḥ pṛthivyā bhartā nando nāma rājā /
GK22vispancu:6488: sā cātīva vallabhāneka-prakāraṃ paritoṣyamāṇāpi na prasīdati /
GK22vispancu:6492: tataḥ kathañcit tayoktaṃ-yadi śiro muṇḍayitvā mama pādayor nipatasi,
GK22vispancu:6495: atha nandasya bhāryāpi tathaiva ruṣṭā prasādyamānāpi na tuṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6497: tvayā vinā muhūrtam api na jīvāmi /
GK22vispancu:6499: sābravīt-yadi khalīnaṃ mukhe prakṣityāhaṃ tava pṛṣṭhe samāruhya tvāṃ dhāvayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6503: atha prabhāta-samaye sabhāyām upaviṣṭasya rājñaḥ samīpe vararucir āyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6504: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājā papraccha-bho vararuce /
GK22vispancu:6509: tato bhadra āgatena tvayā māṃ prati vadhopāya-prayāsaḥ prārabdhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6513: bakās tatra na badhyante maunaṃ sarvārtha-sādhanam //Panc_4.46//
GK22vispancu:6521: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne śuddhapaṭo nāma rajakaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6524: atha tena rajakenāṭavyāṃ paribhramatā mṛta-vyāghro dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6527: anena vyāghra-carmaṇā praticchādya rāsabhaṃ rātrau yava-kṣetreṣūtsrakṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6528: yena vyāghraṃ matvā samīpa-vartinaḥ kṣetra-pālā enaṃ na niṣkāsayiṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:6531: evaṃ gacchatā kālena sa rāsabhaḥ pīvara-tanur jātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6533: athānyasminn ahani sa madhoddhato dūrād rāsabhī-śabdam aśṛṇot /
GK22vispancu:6535: atha te kṣetra-pālā rāsabho 'yaṃ vyāghra-carma-praticchanna iti jñātvā laguḍa-śara-pāṣāṇa-prahārais taṃ vyāpāditavantaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6538: tat kiṃ śyāmalakavad atyapamāna-sahanād ardha-candra-dānena yāsyasi /
GK22vispancu:6543: asty atra dharā-pīṭhe vikaṇṭakaṃ nāma puram /
GK22vispancu:6545: tasya catvāro jāmātṛkā avantī-pīṭhāt prāghūrṇikā vikaṇṭaka-pure samāyātāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6546: te ca yena mahatā gauraveṇābhyarcitā bhojānācchādanādibhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:6547: evaṃ teṣāṃ tatra vasatāṃ māsa-ṣaṭkaṃ sañjātam /
GK22vispancu:6548: tata īśvareṇa svabhāryoktā yad ete jāmātaraḥ parama-gauraveṇāvarjitāḥ svāmi gṛhāṇi na gacchanti,
GK22vispancu:6551: tad adya bhojana-velāyāṃ pāda-prakṣālanārthaṃ jalaṃ na deyaṃ yenāpamānaṃ jñātvā parityajya gacchantīti /
GK22vispancu:6556: caturthaḥ śyāmalako yāvan na yāti tāvad ardha-candra-pradānena niṣkāsitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6559: gargo hi pāda-śaucāl laghv-āsana-dānato gataḥ somaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6561: tat kim ahaṃ rathakāravan mūrkho yataḥ svayam api dṛṣṭvā te vikāra-paścād viśvasimi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6562: pratyakṣe'pi kṛte pāpe mūrkhaḥ sāmnā praśāmyati /
GK22vispancu:6568: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaścid rathakāraḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6570: so 'pi tasyāḥ parīkṣārthaṃ vyacintayat-kathaṃ mayāsyāḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GK22vispancu:6572: nadīnāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GK22vispancu:6573: parīkṣā na prakartavyā strīṇāṃ duścaritasya ca //Panc_4.49//
GK22vispancu:6575: tathā jāto vyāso śata-guṇa-nivāsaḥ kim aparam /
GK22vispancu:6577: sa evābhā̆c chrīmān ahaha viṣamā karma-gatayaḥ //Panc_4.50//
GK22vispancu:6578: kulānām iti pāṇḍavānām api mahātmanāṃ notpattir adhigantavyā yataḥ te kṣetrajā iti /
GK22vispancu:6579: strī-duścaritaṃ sandhukṣyamāṇam aneka-doṣān prakaṭayati strīṇām iti / tathā ca-
GK22vispancu:6580: yadi syāt pāvakaḥ śītaḥ proṣṇo vā śaśa-lāñchanaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6581: strīṇāṃ tadā satītvaṃ syād yadi syād durjano hitaḥ //Panc_4.51//
GK22vispancu:6582: yathāpi śuddhām aśuddhāṃ vāpi jānāmi loka-vacanāt / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6583: yan na vedeṣu śāstreṣu na dṛṣṭaṃ na ca saṃśrutam /
GK22vispancu:6584: tat sarvaṃ vetti loko 'yaṃ yat syād brahmāṇḍa-madhyagam //Panc_4.52//
GK22vispancu:6586: ahaṃ prātar grāmāntaraṃ yāsyāmi tatra dināni katicil lagiṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:6587: tat tvayā kiñcit pātheyaṃ mama yogyaṃ kāryam /
GK22vispancu:6588: sāpi tad ākarṇya harṣita-cittautsukyena sarva-kāryāṇi santyajya siddham annaṃ ghṛta-śarkarā-prāyam akarot /
GK22vispancu:6593: sāpi taṃ prasthitaṃ vijñāya prahasita-vadanāṅga-satkāraṃ kurvāṇā kathañcit taṃ divasam atyavāhayat /
GK22vispancu:6594: tataś ca pūrva-paricitaṃ viṭa-gṛhaṃ gatvā tam abhyarthoktavatī yad-grāmāntaraṃ gataḥ sa durātmā me patiḥ /
GK22vispancu:6595: tad adya tvayāsmad-gṛhe prasupte jane samāgantavyam /
GK22vispancu:6596: tathānuṣṭhite sa rathakāro 'py araṇye dinam ativāhya pradoṣe sva-gṛham apara-dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ śayyā-tale nibhṛto bhūtvā sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6598: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rathakāro roṣāviṣṭa-citto vyacintayat-kim enam utthāya vināśayāmy athavā dvāv apy etau suptau helayā hanmi /
GK22vispancu:6599: paraṃ paśyāmi tāvac ceṣṭitam asyāḥ śṛṇomi cānena sahālāpān /
GK22vispancu:6600: atrāntare sā gṛha-dvāraṃ nibhṛtaṃ pidhāya śayana-talam ārūḍhā /
GK22vispancu:6601: tasyās tac-chayanam ārohantyā rathakāra-śarīre pādo lagnaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6602: tato vyacintayat-nūnam etena durātmanā rathakāreṇa mat-parīkṣārthaṃ bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:6604: evaṃ tasyāś cintayantyāḥ sa devadattaḥ sparśotsukyo babhūva /
GK22vispancu:6609: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā tvāṃ bhasmasāt kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6610: sa āha-yady evaṃ tarhi kim arthaṃ tvayāhūtaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6613: aham adya pratyūṣe devatā-darśanārthaṃ caṇḍikāyatanaṃ gatā /
GK22vispancu:6614: tatrākasmāt khe vāṇī sañjātā-putri, kiṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:6618: yayā tvam āpadaṃ vetsi tathā tat-partīkāram api jānāsi /
GK22vispancu:6619: tad asti kaścid upāyo yena me patiḥ śata-saṃvatsara-jīvī bhavati /
GK22vispancu:6621: sann api nāsti yatas tavāyattaḥ sa pratīkāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:6623: yan mat-prāṇair bhavati tad ādeśaya yena karomi /
GK22vispancu:6624: tato devyābhihitaṃ-yady adya dine para-puruṣeṇa sahaikasmiñ chayane samāruhyāliṅganaṃ karoṣi,
GK22vispancu:6628: yat kiñcit kartum anās tat kuruṣva,
GK22vispancu:6631: so 'pi rathakāro mūrkhas tasyās tad-vacanam ākarṇya pulakāṅkita-tanuḥ śayyā-talān niṣkramya tām uvāca-sādhu pativrate /
GK22vispancu:6634: ahaṃ durjana-vacana-śaṅkita-hṛdayas tvat-parīkṣārthaṃ grāmāntara-vyājaṃ kṛtvātra nibhṛtaṃ khaṭvā-tale līnaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6640: sva-skandhe tām āropya tam api devadattam uvāca-bhoḥ mahānubhāva /
GK22vispancu:6642: tvat-prasādāt prāptām adya mayā varṣa-śata-pramāṇam āyuḥ /
GK22vispancu:6643: tatas tvam api māṃ samāliṅgaya skandhaṃ me samāroha /
GK22vispancu:6645: api devadattaṃ balād āliṅgya skandhe samāropitavān /
GK22vispancu:6646: tataś ca tūrya-dhvani-cchandena nṛtyan sakala-gṛha-dvāreṣu babhrāma /
GK22vispancu:6652: athavā yan māṃ tvaṃ viśvāsayasi tat te doṣo nāsti,
GK22vispancu:6653: yat īdṛśī svabhāva-duṣṭā yuṣmaj-jātir yā śiṣṭa-saṅgād api saumyatvaṃ na yāti /
GK22vispancu:6659: anye'pi ye tvad-vidhā bhavanti te sva-kāryaṃ vibhavaṃ mitraṃ ca parityajanti tat-kṛte / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6660: yā mamodvijate nityaṃ sādya mām avagūhate /
GK22vispancu:6661: priya-kāraka bhadraṃ te yan mamāsti harasva tat //Panc_4.55//
GK22vispancu:6666: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kāmāturo nāma mahādhano vṛddha-vaṇik /
GK22vispancu:6667: tena mṛta-bhāryeṇa kāmopahata-cetasā kācin nirdhana-vaṇik-sutā prabhūtaṃ vittaṃ dattvodvāhitā /
GK22vispancu:6668: atha sā duḥkhābhibhūtā taṃ vṛddha-vaṇijaṃ draṣṭum api na śaśāka /
GK22vispancu:6670: śvetaṃ padaṃ śirasi yat tu śiroruhāṇāṃ
GK22vispancu:6671: sthānaṃ paraṃ paribhavasya tad eva puṃsām /
GK22vispancu:6675: gātraṃ saṅkucitaṃ gati-vigalitā dantāś ca nāśaṃ gatāh
GK22vispancu:6676: dṛṣṭir bhrāmyati rūpam eva hrasate vaktraṃ ca lālāyate /
GK22vispancu:6677: vākyaṃ naiva karoti bāndhava-janaḥ patnī na śuśrūṣate
GK22vispancu:6679: atha kadācit sā tena sahaika-śayane parāṅ-mukhī yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvat tasya gṛhe cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6680: sāpi taṃ cauram avalokya bhaya-vyākulā vṛddham api patiṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliliṅga /
GK22vispancu:6684: tataś ca yāvan nipuṇatayāvalokayati tāvat cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ koṇaika-deśe tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6685: punar apy acintayat-nūnam eṣā caurasya bhayān mām āliṅgati /
GK22vispancu:6686: taj jñātvā cauram āha-yā mamodvijate nityaṃ sādya (55) iti /
GK22vispancu:6688: nityam eva tvayā rātrāv āgantavyaṃ madīyo 'yaṃ vibhavas tvadīya iti /
GK22vispancu:6691: kiṃ bahunā, tena ca strī-lubdhena svaṃ sarvaṃ caurasya samarpitam /
GK22vispancu:6693: athaiva tena saha vadato makarasya jalacareṇaikenāgatyābhihitam-bho makara /
GK22vispancu:6694: tvadīyā bhāryānaśanopaviṣṭā tvayi cirayati praṇayābhibhavād vipannā /
GK22vispancu:6695: evaṃ tad-vajra-pāta-sadṛśa-vacanam ākarṇyātīvra-vyākulita-hṛdayaḥ pralapitam evaṃ cakāra-aho kim idaṃ sañjātaṃ me manda-bhāgasya / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6696: na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate /
GK22vispancu:6699: vṛkṣa-mūle'pi dayitā yatra tiṣṭhati tad gṛham /
GK22vispancu:6701: mātā yasya gṛhe nāsti bhāryā ca priya-vādinī /
GK22vispancu:6702: araṇyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ yathāraṇyaṃ tathā gṛham //Panc_4.60//
GK22vispancu:6705: sampraty ahaṃ tu strī-viyogād vaiśvānara-praveśaṃ kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6711: bhāryā-rūpeṇa sā jñeyā vidagdhair dāruṇā jarā //Panc_4.61//
GK22vispancu:6713: strīṇām iha hi sarvāsāṃ ya icchet sukham ātmanaḥ //Panc_4.62//
GK22vispancu:6714: yad-antas tan na jihvāyāṃ yaj jihvāyāṃ na tad-bahiḥ /
GK22vispancu:6715: yad-bahis tan na kurvanti vicitra-caritāḥ striyaḥ //Panc_4.63//
GK22vispancu:6716: ke nāma na vinaśyanti mithyā-jñānān nitambinīm /
GK22vispancu:6717: ramyāṃ te upasarpanti dīpābhāṃ śalabhā yathā //Panc_4.64//
GK22vispancu:6718: antar-viṣa-mayā hy etā bahiś caiva manoramāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6720: tāḍitā api daṇḍena śastrair api vikhaṇḍitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6721: na vaśaṃ yoṣito yānti na dānair na ca saṃstavaiḥ //Panc_4.66//
GK22vispancu:6722: āstāṃ tāvat kim anyena daurātmyeneha yoṣitām /
GK22vispancu:6723: vidhṛtaṃ svodareṇāpi ghnanti putram api svakam //Panc_4.67//
GK22vispancu:6734: yādṛśaṃ mama pāṇḍityaṃ tādṛśaṃ dviguṇaṃ tava /
GK22vispancu:6735: nābhūj jāro na bhartā ca kiṃ nirīkṣasi nagnike //Panc_4.69//
GK22vispancu:6741: sā ca hālika-bhāryā patyur vṛddha-bhāvāt sadaivānya-cittā na kathañcid gṛhe sthairyam ālambate /
GK22vispancu:6743: atha kenacit para-vittāpahārakeṇa dhūrtena sā lakṣitā vijane proktā ca-subhage /
GK22vispancu:6748: yady evaṃ tad asti me patyuḥ prabhūtaṃ dhanam /
GK22vispancu:6749: sa ca vṛddhatvāt pracalitum apy asamarthaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6751: yena tvayā sahānyatra gatvā yathecchayā rati-sukham anubhaviṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6753: tat pratyūṣe'tra sthāne śīghram eva samāgantavyam,
GK22vispancu:6754: yena śubhataraṃ kiñcin nagaraṃ gatvā tvayā saha jīva-lokaḥ saphalīkriyate /
GK22vispancu:6755: sāpi tatheti pratijñāya prahasita-vadanā sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā rātrau prasupte bhartari sarvaṃ vittam ādāya pratyūṣa-samaye tat-kathita-sthānam upādravat /
GK22vispancu:6756: dhūrto 'pi tām agre vidhāya dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritya satvara-gatiḥ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6757: evaṃ tayor vrajator yojana-dvaya-mātreṇāgrataḥ kācin nadī samupasthitā /
GK22vispancu:6758: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūrtaś cintayāmāsa-kim aham anayā yauvana-prānte vartamānayā kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6759: kiṃ ca kadāpy asyāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ ko 'pi sameṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6761: tat kevalam asyā vittam ādāya gacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:6764: tad ahaṃ dravya-mātrāṃ pāre dhṛtvā samāgacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:6765: tatas tvām ekākinīṃ sva-pṛṣṭham āropya sukhenottārayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6772: tathānuṣṭhite dhūrto vittaṃ vastra-yugalaṃ cādāya yathācintita-viṣayaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6773: sāpi kaṇṭha-niveśita-hasta-yugalā sodvegā nadī-pulina-deśa upaviṣṭā yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad etasminn antare kācic chṛgālikā māṃsa-piṇḍa-gṛhīta-vadanā tatrājagāma /
GK22vispancu:6775: tāvan nadī mahān matsyaḥ salilān niṣkramya bahiḥ sthita āste /
GK22vispancu:6776: evaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sā māṃsa-piṇḍaṃ samutsṛjya taṃ matsyaṃ pratyupādravat /
GK22vispancu:6778: atrāntaram ākāśād avatīrya ko 'pi gṛdhras taṃ māṃsa-piṇḍam ādāya punaḥ kham utpatāta /
GK22vispancu:6781: sā śṛgālikā vyartha-śramā gṛdhram avalokayantī tayā nagnikayā sa-smitam abhihitā-
GK22vispancu:6784: mitraṃ hy amitratāṃ yātam aparaṃ me priyā mitrā /
GK22vispancu:6785: gṛham anyena ca vyāptaṃ kim adyāpi bhaviṣyati //Panc_4.71//
GK22vispancu:6787: kṣate prahārā nipatanty abhīkṣṇam anna-kṣaye vardhati jāṭharāgniḥ /
GK22vispancu:6788: āpatsu vairāṇi samudbhavanti vāme vidhau sarvam idaṃ narāṇām //Panc_4.72//
GK22vispancu:6791: kiṃ vā sāmnaiva sambodhya gṛhān niḥsārayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:6792: kiṃ vā bhedaṃ dānaṃ vā karomi ?
GK22vispancu:6793: athavāmum eva vānara-mitraṃ pṛcchāmi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6794: yaḥ pṛṣṭvā kurute kāryaṃ praṣṭavyān sva-hitān gurūn /
GK22vispancu:6795: na tasya jāyate vighnaḥ kasmiṃścid api karmaṇi //Panc_4.73//
GK22vispancu:6796: evaṃ sampradhārya bhūyo 'pi tam eva jambū-vṛkṣam ārūḍhaṃ kapim apṛcchat-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:6798: tat samprati gṛham api me balavattareṇa makareṇa ruddham /
GK22vispancu:6803: mayā niṣiddho 'pi kiṃ bhūyo mām anusarasi /
GK22vispancu:6806: sāparādhasya me pūrva-sneham anusmṛtya hitopadeśaṃ dehi /
GK22vispancu:6808: yad bhāryā-vākyena bhavatāhaṃ samudre prakṣiptuṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6810: yadyapi bhāryā sarva-lokād api vallabhā bhavati,
GK22vispancu:6811: tathāpi na mitrāṇi bāndhavāś ca bhāryā-vākyena samudre prakṣipyante /
GK22vispancu:6813: mūḍhatvena nāśas tava mayā prāg eva nivedita āsīt, yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6814: satāṃ vacanam ādiṣṭaṃ madena na karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6815: sa vināśam avāpnoti ghaṇṭoṣṭra iva satvaram //Panc_4.74//
GK22vispancu:6820: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne ujjvalako nāma rathakāraḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6823: yataḥ sarvo 'pi janaḥ sva-karmaṇaiva ratas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6825: yataḥ sarva-lokānāṃ cirantanāś caturbhūmikā gṛhāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:6829: yāvat kiñcid vanaṃ gacchati tāvad gahvarākāra-vana-gahana-madhye sūryāstam anavelāyāṃ sva-yūthād bhraṣṭāṃ prasava-vedanayā pīḍyamānām uṣṭrīm apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:6830: sa ca dāseraka-yuktām uṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-sthānābhimukhaḥ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6831: gṛham āsādya rajjuṃ gṛhītvā tām uṣṭrikāṃ babandha /
GK22vispancu:6832: tataś ca tīkṣṇaṃ paraśum ādāya tasyāḥ pallavānayanārthaṃ parvataika-deśe gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6833: tatra ca nūtanāni komalāni bahūni pallavāni cchittvā śirasi samāropya tasyāgre nicikṣepa /
GK22vispancu:6834: tayā ca tāni śanaiḥ śanair bhakṣitāni /
GK22vispancu:6835: paścāt pallava-bhakṣaṇa-prabhāvād aharniśaṃ pīvara-tanur uṣṭrī sañjātā /
GK22vispancu:6837: tataḥ sa nityam eva dugdhaṃ gṛhītvā sva-kuṭumbaṃ paripālayati /
GK22vispancu:6838: atha rathakāreṇa vallabhatvād dāseraka-grīvāyāṃ mahatī ghaṇṭā pratibaddhā /
GK22vispancu:6841: yāvan mamaitasmād evoṣṭrāparipālanād asya kuṭumbasya bhavyaṃ sañjātam /
GK22vispancu:6843: evaṃ vicintya gṛham āgatya priyām āha-bhadre /
GK22vispancu:6845: tava sammatiś cet kuto 'pi dhanikāt kiñcid dravyam ādāya mayā gurjara-deśe gantavyaṃ kalabha-grahaṇāya /
GK22vispancu:6847: yāvad aham aparām uṣṭrīṃ nītvā samāgacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:6848: tataś ca gurjara-deśaṃ gatvoṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-gṛham āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6849: kiṃ bahunā ? tena tathā kṛtaṃ yathā tasya pracurā uṣṭrāḥ karabhāś ca sammilitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6850: tatas tena mahad uṣṭra-yūthaṃ kṛtvā rakṣā-puruṣo dhṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6851: tasya prativarṣaṃ vṛttyā karabham ekaṃ prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:6852: prativarṣam anyac cāharniśaṃ dugdha-pānaṃ tasya nirūpitam /
GK22vispancu:6853: evaṃ rathakāro 'pi nityam evoṣṭrī-karabha-vyāpāraṃ kurvan sukhena tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6855: komala-vallīr yathecchayā bhakṣayitvā mahati sarasi pānīyaṃ pītvā sāyantana-samaye mandaṃ mandaṃ līlayā gṛham āgacchanti /
GK22vispancu:6856: sa ca pūrva-dāserako madātirekāt pṛṣṭha āgatya milati /
GK22vispancu:6858: manda-matir ayaṃ dāserako yathā yūthād bhraṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhe sthitvā ghaṇṭāṃ vādayann āgacchati /
GK22vispancu:6861: atha tasya tad-vanaṃ gāhamānasya kaścit siṃho ghaṇṭā-ravam ākarṇya samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6864: ekas tu punaḥ pṛṣṭhe krīḍāṃ kurvan vallarīś caran yāvat tiṣṭhati,
GK22vispancu:6865: tāvad anye dāserakāḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā sva-gṛhe gatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6867: tāvan na kañcin mārgaṃ paśyati vetti ca /
GK22vispancu:6868: yūthād bhraṣṭo mandaṃ mandaṃ bṛhac-chabdaṃ kurvan yāvat kiyad-dūraṃ gacchati,
GK22vispancu:6869: tāvat tac-chabdānusārī siṃho 'pi kramaṃ kṛtvā nibhṛto 'yaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6871: tāvat siṃhena lambhayitvā grīvāyāṃ gṛhīto māritaś ca /
GK22vispancu:6876: parasminn iha loke ca vyasanaṃ nopapadyate //Panc_4.75//
GK22vispancu:6877: tata sarvathā kṛtaghnasyāpi me kuru prasādam upadeśa-pradānena / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6878: upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhutve tasya ko guṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6879: apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sa sādhuḥ sadbhir ucyate //Panc_4.76//
GK22vispancu:6881: yady evaṃ tarhi tatra gatvā tena saha yuddhaṃ kuru / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6882: hatas tvaṃ prāpsyasi svargaṃ jīvan gṛham atho yaśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6890: āsīt kasmiṃścid deśe mahā-caturako nāma śṛgālaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6891: tena kadācid araṇye svayaṃ mṛto gajaḥ samāsāditaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6893: paraṃ kaṭhināṃ tvacaṃ bhettuṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:6894: athātrāvasara itaś cetaś ca vicaran kaścit siṃhas tatraiva pradeśe samāyayau /
GK22vispancu:6895: atha siṃhaṃ samāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa kṣiti-tala-vinyasta-mauli-maṇḍalaḥ saṃyojita-kara-yugalaḥ sa-vinayam uvāca-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:6896: tvadīyo 'haṃ lāguḍikaḥ sthitas tvad-arthe gajam imaṃ rakṣāmi /
GK22vispancu:6899: nāham anyena hataṃ sattvaṃ kadācid api bhakṣayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6901: tac chrutvā śṛgālaḥ sānandam āha-yuktam idaṃ svāmino nija-bhṛtyeṣu /
GK22vispancu:6903: antyāvastho 'pi mahān svāmi-guṇān na jahāti śuddhatayā /
GK22vispancu:6905: atha siṃhe gate kaścid vyāghraḥ samāyayau /
GK22vispancu:6910: na khalu bhedaṃ vinā sādhyo bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6912: na yatra śakyate kartuṃ sāma dānam athāpi vā /
GK22vispancu:6913: bhedas tatra prayoktavyo yataḥ sa vaśa-kārakaḥ //Panc_4.80//
GK22vispancu:6918: evaṃ sampradhārya tasyābhimukho bhūtvā garvād unnata-kandharaḥ sa-sambhramam uvāca-māma /
GK22vispancu:6921: sa ca mām etad rakṣaṇaṃ niyujya nadyāṃ snānārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6922: tena ca gacchatā mama samādiṣṭam-yadi kaścid iha vyāghraḥ samāyāti,
GK22vispancu:6924: yena vanam idaṃ mayā nirvyāghraṃ kartavyam /
GK22vispancu:6925: yataḥ pūrvaṃ vyāghreṇaikena mayā vyāpādito gajaḥ śūnye bhakṣayitvocchiṣṭatāṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6927: tac chrutvā vyāghraḥ santrastam āha-bho bhāgineya /
GK22vispancu:6929: tvayā tasyātra cirāyāyātasyāpi madīyā kāpi vārtā nākhyeyā /
GK22vispancu:6931: atha gate vyāghre tatra kaścid dvīpī samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6933: tad asya pārśvād asya gajasya yathā carma-cchedo bhavati tathā karomi /
GK22vispancu:6934: evaṃ niścitya tam apy uvāca-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6940: paraṃ tathāpi yāvat siṃho na samāyāti,
GK22vispancu:6941: tāvad asya gajasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā tṛptiṃ kṛtvā drutataraṃ vraja /
GK22vispancu:6942: sa āha-māma, tad evaṃ tan na kāryaṃ me māṃsāśanena,
GK22vispancu:6944: uktaṃ ca-yac chakyaṃ grasitaṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat (23) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:6945: tat sarvathā tad eva bhujyate yad eva pariṇamati /
GK22vispancu:6950: tathānuṣṭhite dīvpinā bhinnāṃ tvacaṃ vijñāya jambūkenābhihitam-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6954: atha yāvad asau tad-bheda-kṛta-dvāreṇa kiñcin māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati,
GK22vispancu:6956: atha tam ātma-tulya-parākramaṃ dṛṣṭvā-uttamaṃ praṇipātena śūraṃ bhedena yojayet (78)
GK22vispancu:6957: iti ślokaṃ paṭhan tad-abhimukha-kṛta-prayāṇaḥ sva-daṃṣṭrābhis taṃ vidārya diśo bhāgaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ sukhena cira-kālaṃ hasti-māṃsaṃ bubhuje /
GK22vispancu:6958: evaṃ tvam api taṃ ripuṃ sva-jātīyaṃ yuddhena paribhūya diśo-bhāgaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:6959: no cet paścād baddha-mūlād asmāt tvam api vināśam avāpsyasi /
GK22vispancu:6961: sambhāvyaṃ goṣu sampannaṃ sambhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6962: sambhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ sambhāvyaṃ jātito bhayam //Panc_4.82//
GK22vispancu:6965: eko doṣo videśasya svajātir yad virudhyate //Panc_4.83//
GK22vispancu:6970: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne citrāṅgo nāma sārameyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6973: atha citrāṅgaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhas tad-bhayād deśāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6974: tatra ca kasmiṃścit pure kasyacid gṛha-medhino gṛhiṇyāḥ prasādena pratidinaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśya vividhānnāni bhakṣayan parāṃ tṛptiṃ gacchati /
GK22vispancu:6975: paraṃ tad-gṛhād bahir niṣkrānto 'nyair madoddhata-sārameyaiḥ sarva-dikṣu parivṛtya sarvāṅgaṃ daṃṣṭrābhir vidāryate /
GK22vispancu:6977: varaṃ sva-deśo yatra durbhikṣe'pi sukhena sthīyate /
GK22vispancu:6979: tad evaṃ sva-nagaraṃ vrajāmi ity avadhārya sva-sthānaṃ prati jagāma /
GK22vispancu:6980: athāsau deśāntarāt samāyātaḥ sarvair api svajanaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoś citrāṅga /
GK22vispancu:6989: so 'pi makaras tad-upadeśaṃ śrutvā kṛta-maraṇa-niścayo vānaram anujñāpya svāśrayaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6990: tatra ca tena sva-gṛha-praviṣṭenātatāyinā saha vigrahaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍha-sattvāvaṣṭambhanāc ca taṃ vyāpādya svāśrayaṃ ca labdhvā sukhena cira-kālam atiṣṭhat /
GK22vispancu:6992: akṛtvā pauruṣaṃ yā śrīḥ kiṃ tayālasa-bhāgyayā /
GK22vispancu:7004: tan nareṇa na kartavyaṃ nāpitenātra yat kṛtam //Panc_5.1//
GK22vispancu:7005: tad yathānuśrūyate-asti dākṣiṇātye janapade pāṭaliputraṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:7006: tatra maṇibhadro nāma śreṣṭhī prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7007: tasya ca dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣa-karmāṇi kurvato vidhi-vaśād dhana-kṣayaḥ sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7008: tato vibhava-kṣayād apamāna-paramparayā paraṃ viṣādaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7009: athānyadā rātrau suptiś cintitavān-aho dhig iyaṃ daridratā / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7010: śīlaṃ śaucaṃ kṣāntir dākṣiṇyaṃ madhuratā kule janma /
GK22vispancu:7011: na virājanti hi sarve vitta-vihīnasya pusuṣasya //Panc_5.2//
GK22vispancu:7012: māno vā darpo vā vijñānaṃ vibhramaḥ subuddhir vā /
GK22vispancu:7013: sarvaṃ praṇaśyati samaṃ vitta-vihīno yadā puruṣaḥ //Panc_5.3//
GK22vispancu:7016: naśyati vipulamater api buddhiḥ puruṣasya manda-vibhavasya /
GK22vispancu:7019: suṣkam iva saraḥ śmaśānam iva raudram /
GK22vispancu:7022: na vibhāvyante laghavo vitta-vihīnāḥ puro 'pi nivasantaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7023: satataṃ jāta-vinaṣṭāḥ payasām iva budbudāḥ payasi //Panc_5.7//
GK22vispancu:7025: āḍhye kalpa-tarāv iva nityaṃ rajyanti jana-nivahāḥ //Panc_5.8//
GK22vispancu:7027: yasya yadā vibhavaḥ syāt tasya tadā dāsatāṃ yānti //Panc_5.9//
GK22vispancu:7028: laghur ayam āha na lokaḥ kāmaṃ garjantam api patiṃ payasām /
GK22vispancu:7029: sarvam alajjākaram iha yad yat kurvanti paripūrṇāḥ //Panc_5.10//
GK22vispancu:7030: evaṃ sampradhārya bhūyo 'py acintayat-tad aham anaśanaṃ kṛtvā prāṇān utsṛjāmi /
GK22vispancu:7033: atha tasya svapne padmanidhiḥ kṣapaṇaka-rūpo darśanaṃ dattvā provāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin /
GK22vispancu:7036: tad anenaiva rūpeṇa prātas tvad-gṛham āgamiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7039: atha prātaḥ prabuddhaḥ san svapnaṃ smaraṃś cintā-cakram ārūḍhas tiṣṭhati-aho satyo 'yaṃ svapnaḥ kiṃ vā asatyo bhaviṣyati, na jñāyate /
GK22vispancu:7041: yato 'ham ahar-niśaṃ kevalaṃ vittam eva cintayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7044: etasminn antare tasya bhāryayā kaścin nāpitaḥ pāda-prakṣālanāyāhūtaḥ atrāntare ca yathā-nirdiṣṭaḥ kṣapaṇakaḥ sahasā prādurbabhūva /
GK22vispancu:7045: atha sa tam ālokya prahṛṣṭa-manā yathāsanna-kāṣṭha-daṇḍena taṃ śirasy atāḍayat /
GK22vispancu:7046: so 'pi suvarṇa-mayo bhūtvā tat-kṣaṇāt bhūmau nipatitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7047: atha taṃ sa śreṣṭhī nibhṛtaṃ sva-gṛha-madhye kṛtvā nāpitaṃ santoṣya provāca-tad etad dhanaṃ vastrāṇi ca mayā dattāni gṛhāṇa /
GK22vispancu:7050: nāpito 'pi sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā vyacintayat-nūnam ete sarve'pi nagnakāḥ śirasi tāḍitāḥ kāñcana-mayā bhavanti /
GK22vispancu:7051: tad aham api prātaḥ prabhūtān āhūya laguḍaiḥ śirasi hanmi,
GK22vispancu:7054: atha prabhāte'bhyutthāya bṛhal laguḍam ekaṃ praguṇīkṛtya,
GK22vispancu:7056: jānubhyām avaniṃ gatvā vaktra-dvāra-nyastottarīyāñcalas tāra-svareṇemaṃ ślokam apaṭhat-
GK22vispancu:7060: sā jihvā yā jinaṃ stauti tac-cittaṃ yaj jine ratam /
GK22vispancu:7061: tau eva tu karau ślāghyau yau tat-pūjā-karau karau //Panc_5.13//
GK22vispancu:7063: dhyāna-vyājam upetya cintayasi kām unmīlya cakṣuḥ kṣaṇaṃ
GK22vispancu:7064: paśyānaṅga-śarāturaṃ janam imaṃ trātāpi no rakṣasi /
GK22vispancu:7066: serṣyaṃ māra-vadhūbhir ity abhihito bauddho jinaḥ pātu vaḥ //Panc_5.14//
GK22vispancu:7068: tataḥ pradhāna-kṣapaṇakaṇam āsādya kṣiti-nihita-jānu-caraṇaḥ-namo 'stu vande ity uccārya,

GK22vispancu:7445: tad aham anya-jalāśayam adyaiva sabhāryo yāsyāmi /

GK22vispancu:7449: tāv api śatabuddhi-sahasrabuddhī sabhāryau palāyamānau ciram ātmānaṃ gati-viśeṣa-vijñānaiḥ kuṭila-cāreṇa rakṣantau jāle nipatitau,
GK22vispancu:7451: athāparāhna-samaye prahṛṣṭās te dhīvarāḥ sva-gṛhaṃ prati prasthitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7452: gurutvāc caikena śatabuddhiḥ skandhe kṛtaḥ sahasrabuddhiḥ pralambamāno nīyate /
GK22vispancu:7453: tataś ca vāpīkaṇṭhopagatena maṇḍūkena tau tathā nīyamānau dṛṣṭvā abhihitā svapatnī-priye /
GK22vispancu:7456: ekabuddhir ahaṃ bhadre krīḍāmi vimale jale //Panc_5.48//
GK22vispancu:7457: ataś ca varaṃ buddhir na sā vidyā yad bhavatoktaṃ tatreyaṃ me matir yat na ekāntena buddhir api pramāṇam /
GK22vispancu:7464: sādhu mātula gītena mayā prokto 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7470: kasmiṃścd adhiṣṭhāne uddhato nāma gardabhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7471: sa sadaiva rajaka-gṛhe bhārodvahanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svecchayā paryaṭati /
GK22vispancu:7472: tataḥ pratyūṣe bandhana-bhayāt svayam eva rajaka-gṛham āyāti /
GK22vispancu:7474: atha tasya rātrau kṣetrāṇi paryaṭataḥ kadācic chṛgālena saha maitrī sañjātā sa ca pīvaratvād vṛtti-bhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā karkaṭikā-kṣetre śṛgāla-sahitaḥ praviśati /
GK22vispancu:7477: atha kadācit tena madoddhatena rāsabhena kṣetra-madhya-sthitena śṛgāo 'bhihitaḥ-bhoḥ bhaginī-sūta /
GK22vispancu:7484: nibhṛtaiś ca caura-jārair atra sthātavyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7485: kāṃsī vivarjayec cauryaṃ nidrāluś cet sa puṃścalīm /
GK22vispancu:7486: jihvā-laulyaṃ ca rujākrānto jīvitaṃ yo 'tra vāñchati //Panc_5.50//
GK22vispancu:7489: tad atra kṣetre rakṣā-puruṣāḥ susuptāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:7490: te utthāya vadhaṃ bandhanaṃ vā kariṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:7493: tac chrutvā rābhasa āha-bhoḥ vanāśrayatvāt tvaṃ gīta-rasaṃ na vetsi,
GK22vispancu:7504: sapta svarās trayo grāmā mūrcchatāś caikatriṃśatiḥ /
GK22vispancu:7505: tānās tv ekonapaūcāśat tisro mātrā layās trayaḥ //Panc_5.52//
GK22vispancu:7506: sthāna-trayaṃ yatīnāṃ ca ṣaḍ-asyāni rasā nava /
GK22vispancu:7507: rāgā ṣaṭ-triṃśatir bhāvāś catvāriṃśat tataḥ smṛtāḥ //Panc_5.53//
GK22vispancu:7508: pañcāśīty-adhikaṃ hy etad gītāṅgānāṃ śataṃ smṛtam /
GK22vispancu:7509: svayam eva purā proktaṃ bharatena śruteḥ param //Panc_5.54//
GK22vispancu:7510: nānyad gītāt priyaṃ loke devānām api dṛśyate /
GK22vispancu:7512: tat kathaṃ bhaginī-suta mām anabhijñaṃ vadan nivārayati ?
GK22vispancu:7514: yady evaṃ yāvad vṛtter dvāra-sthitaḥ kṣetrapālam avalokayāmi,
GK22vispancu:7516: tathānuṣṭhite rāsabha-raṭanam ākarṇya kṣetrapaḥ krodhāt dantān dharṣayan pradhāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7517: yāvad rāsabho dṛṣṭas tāval laguḍa-prahārais tathā hato,
GK22vispancu:7519: tataś ca sac-chidram ulūkhalaṃ tasya gale baddhvā kṣetrapālaḥ prasuptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7520: rāsabho 'pi svajāti-svabhāvād gata-vedanaḥ kṣaṇenābhyutthitaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7522: muhūrtāt paratau na syāt prahāra-janitā vyathā //Panc_5.56//
GK22vispancu:7523: tata tam evolūkhalam ādāya vṛttiṃ cūrṇayitvā palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7524: atrāntare śṛgālo 'pi dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā sa-smitam āha-
GK22vispancu:7525: sādhu mātula gītena mayā prokto 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7527: tad bhavān api mayā vāryamāṇo 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7531: yasya nāsti svayaṃ prajñā mitroktaṃ na karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7532: sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti yathā manthara-kolikaḥ //Panc_5.58//
GK22vispancu:7537: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne mantharako nāma kaulikaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7538: tasya kadācit paṭa-karmāṇi kurvataḥ sarva-paṭa-karma-kāṣṭhāni bhagnāni /
GK22vispancu:7539: tataḥ sa kuṭhāram ādāya vane kāṣṭhārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7540: sa ca samudra-taṭe yāvad bhraman prayātaḥ tāvat tatra śiṃśapā-pādapas tena dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7542: tad anenaiva kartitena prabhūtāni paṭa-karmopakaraṇāni bhaviṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:7544: atha tatra vṛkṣe kaścit vyantaraḥ samāśritya āsīt /
GK22vispancu:7551: dāru-sāmagrīṃ vinā me kuṭumbaṃ bubhukṣayā pīḍyate /
GK22vispancu:7558: kaulika āha-yady eva tad ahaṃ sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-mitraṃ sva-bhāryāṃ ca pṛṣṭvā āgamiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7560: atha tatheti vyantareṇa pratijñāte sa kaulikaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ prati nivṛtto yāvad agre gacchati,
GK22vispancu:7570: yena tvaṃ rājā bhavasi ahaṃ tvan-mantrī /
GK22vispancu:7571: dvāv apīha sukham anubhūya para-loka-sukham anubhavāvaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7572: rājā dāna-paro nityam iha kīrtim avāpya ca /
GK22vispancu:7573: tat prabhāvāt punaḥ svargaṃ spardhate tridaśaiḥ saha //Panc_5.59//
GK22vispancu:7574: kaulika āha-asty etat tathāpi gṛhiṇīṃ pṛcchāmi /
GK22vispancu:7576: śāstra-viruddham etat yat striyā saha mantraḥ /
GK22vispancu:7577: yatas tāḥ svalpa-matayo bhavanti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7579: bhūṣaṇādyaṃ ca nārīṇāṃ na tābhir mantrayet sudhīḥ //Panc_5.60//
GK22vispancu:7580: yatra strī yatra kitavo bālo yatra praśāsitā /
GK22vispancu:7581: tad gṛhaṃ kṣayam āyāti bhārgavo hīdam abravīt //Panc_5.61//
GK22vispancu:7582: tāvat syāt suprasannāsyas tāvad guru-jane rataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7583: puruṣo yoṣitāṃ yāvan na śṛṇoti vaco rahaḥ //Panc_5.62//
GK22vispancu:7584: etāḥ svārtha-parā nāryaḥ kevalaṃ sva-sukhe ratāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7585: na tāsāṃ vallabhaḥ ko 'pi suto 'pi sva-sukhaṃ vinā //Panc_5.63//
GK22vispancu:7588: aparaṃ tām apṛṣṭvāhaṃ na kiñcit karomi /
GK22vispancu:7589: evaṃ tam abhidhāya satvaraṃ gatvā tām uvāca-priye /
GK22vispancu:7594: eṣa tāvan mama mitraṃ nāpito vatady evaṃ yat-rājyaṃ prārthayasva /
GK22vispancu:7597: tan na kāryaṃ tad vacaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7598: cāraṇair vandibhir nīcair nāpitair bālakair api /
GK22vispancu:7599: na mantraṃ maitmān kuryāt sārdhaṃ bhikṣubhir eva ca //Panc_5.64//
GK22vispancu:7600: aparaṃ mahatī kleśa-paramparaiṣā rājya-sthitiḥ sandhi-vigraha-yānāsana-saṃśraya-dvaidhībhāvādibhiḥ kadācit puruṣasya sukhaṃ na prayacchatīti / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:7601: yadaiva rājye kriyate'bhiṣekas tadaiva yāti vyasaneṣu buddhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:7604: rāmasya vrajanaṃ vane nivasanaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ vane
GK22vispancu:7605: vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ nalasya nṛpate rājyāt paribhraṃśanam /
GK22vispancu:7607: dṛṣṭvā rājya-kṛte viḍambana-gataṃ tasmān na tad vāñchayet //Panc_5.66//
GK22vispancu:7608: yad-arthaṃ bhrātaraḥ putrā api vāñchanti ye nijāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7609: vadhaḥ rājya-kṛtāṃ rājñāṃ tad rājyaṃ dūratas tyajet //Panc_5.67//
GK22vispancu:7612: sāha-tvaṃ tāvad ekaṃ paṭaṃ nityam eva niṣpādayasi /
GK22vispancu:7614: idānīṃ tvam ātmano 'nyad bāhu-yugalaṃ dvitīyaṃ śiraś ca yācasva,
GK22vispancu:7615: yena paṭa-dvayaṃ sampādayasi purataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca /
GK22vispancu:7616: ekasya mūlyena gṛḥe yathā-pūrvaṃ vyayaṃ sampādayiṣyasi,
GK22vispancu:7618: evaṃ saukhyena svajāti-madhye ślāghyamānasya kālo yāsyati,
GK22vispancu:7620: so 'pi tad ākarṇya prahṛṣṭaḥ prāha-sādhu pativrate /
GK22vispancu:7626: yadi mamepsitaṃ prayacchasi tat dehi me dvitīyaṃ bāhu-yugalaṃ śiraś ca /
GK22vispancu:7627: evam abhihite tat-kṣaṇād eva sa dviśirāś caturbāhuś ca sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7628: tato hṛṣṭa-manā yāvad gṛham āgacchati tāval-lokaiḥ rākṣaso 'yam iti mānyamānair laguḍa-pāṣāṇa-prahārais tāḍito mṛtaś ca /
GK22vispancu:7629: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-yasya nāsti svayaṃ prajñā iti /
GK22vispancu:7632: sarvo 'pi jano 'śraddeyām āśāpiśācikāṃ prāpya hāsya-padavīṃ yāti /
GK22vispancu:7635: sa eva pāṇḍuraḥ śete soma-śarma-pitā yathā //Panc_5.68//
GK22vispancu:7640: kasmiṃścin nagare kaścit svabhāva-kṛpaṇo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7641: tasya bhikṣārjitaiḥ saktubhir bhukta-śeṣaiḥ kalaśaḥ sampūritaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7642: taṃ ca ghaṭaṃ nāgadante'valambya tasyādhastāt khaṭvāṃ nidhāya satatam eka-dṛṣṭyā tam avalokayati /
GK22vispancu:7643: atha kadācid rātrau suptaś cintayāmāsa-yat paripūrṇo 'yaṃ ghaṭas tāvat saktubhir vartate /
GK22vispancu:7647: tataḥ ṣāṇ-māsikam āprasava-vaśāt tābhyāṃ yūthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7654: tataḥ kaścid brāhmaṇo mama gṛham āgatya prāpta-vayaskāṃ rūpāḍhyāṃ kanyāṃ mahyaṃ dāsyati /
GK22vispancu:7657: tatas tasmin jānu-calana-yogye sañjāte'haṃ pustakaṃ gṛhītvāśva-śālāyāḥ pṛṣṭha-deśe upaviṣṭas tad-avadhārayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7658: atrāntare somaśarmā māṃ dṛṣṭvā janany-utsaṅgāj jānu-calana-paro 'śva-khurāsanna-vartī mat-samīpam āgamiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7662: evaṃ tena dhyāna-sthitena tathaiva pāda-prahāro datto yathā sa ghaṭo bhagnaḥ,
GK22vispancu:7668: yataḥ sarvo 'pi lobhena viḍambito bādhyate ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7675: kasmiṃścin nagare candro nāma bhūpatiḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7676: tasya putrā vānara-krīḍā-ratā vānara-yūthaṃ nityam evāneka-bhojana-bhakṣyādibhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nayanti sma /
GK22vispancu:7677: atha vānarādhipo yaḥ sa auśanasa-bārhaspatya-cāṇakya-mata-vit tad-anuṣṭhātā ca tat-sarvān apy adhyāpayati sma /
GK22vispancu:7678: atha tasmin rāja-gṛhe laghu-kumāra-vāhana-yogyaṃ meṣa-yūtham asti /
GK22vispancu:7679: tan-madhyād eko jihvā-laulyād ahar-niśaṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ mahānase praviśya yat paśyati tat sarvaṃ bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:7680: te ca sūpakar yat kiñcit kāṣṭhaṃ mṛṇ-mayaṃ bhājanaṃ kāṃsya-pātraṃ tāmra-pātraṃ vā paśyanti tenāśu tāḍayanti /
GK22vispancu:7681: so 'pi vānara-yūthapas tad dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-aho meṣa-sūpakāra-kalaho 'yaṃ vānarāṇāṃ kṣayāya bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7684: tad yadi vastuno 'bhāvāt kadācid ulmukena tāḍayiṣyanti,
GK22vispancu:7686: tad dahyamānaḥ punar aśva-kuṭyāṃ samīpa-vartinyāṃ pravekṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7689: śālihotreṇa punar etad uktaṃ yat-vānara-vasayāśvānāṃ vahni-dāha-doṣaḥ praśāmyati /
GK22vispancu:7690: tan nūnam etena bhāvyam atra niścayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7691: evaṃ niścitya sarvān vānarān āhūya rahasi provāca, yat-
GK22vispancu:7694: tasmāt syāt kalaho yatra gṛhe nityam akāraṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7698: tan na yāvat sarveṣāṃ saṅkṣayo bhavati,
GK22vispancu:7699: tāvad evaitad rāja-gṛhaṃ santyajya vanaṃ gacchāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7700: atha tat tasya vacanam aśraddheyaṃ śrutvā madoddhatā vānarāḥ prahasya procuḥ-bho bhavato vṛddha-bhāvād buddhi-vaikalyaṃ sañjātaṃ,
GK22vispancu:7702: vadanaṃ daśanair hīnaṃ lālā sravati nityaśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7703: na matiḥ sphurati kvāpi bāle vṛddhe viśeṣataḥ //Panc_5.73//
GK22vispancu:7704: na vayaṃ svarga-samānopabhogān nānā-vidhān bhakṣya-viśeṣān rāja-putraiḥ sva-dattān amṛta-kalpān parityajya tatrāṭavyāṃ kaṣāya-kaṭu-tikta-kṣāra-rūkṣa-phalāni bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7705: tac chrutvāśru-kaluṣāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ kṛtvā sa provāca-re re mūrkhāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7706: yūyam etasya sukhasya pariṇāmaṃ na jānītha /
GK22vispancu:7707: kiṃ pāka-rasāsvādana-prāyam etat sukhaṃ pariṇāme viṣavad bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7711: dhanyās te ye na paśyanti deśa-bhaṅgaṃ kula-kṣayam //Panc_5.74//
GK22vispancu:7712: evam abhidhāya sarvāṃs tān parityajya sa yūthādhipo 'ṭavyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7713: atha tasmin gate'nyasmin ahani sa meṣo mahānase praviṣṭo,
GK22vispancu:7714: yāvat sūpakāreṇa nānyat kiñcit samāsāditaṃ tāvad ardha-jvalita-kāṣṭhena tāḍyamāno jājvalyamana-śarīraḥ śabdāyamāno 'śva-kuṭyāṃ pratyāsanna-vartinyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7715: tatra tṛṇa-prācurya-yuktāyāṃ kṣitau tasya praluṭhataḥ sarvatrāpi vahni-jvālās tathā samutthitā yathā kecid aśvāḥ sphuṭita-locanāḥ pañcatvaṃ gatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7716: kecid bandhanāni troṭayitvā ardha-dagdha-śarīrā itaś cetaś ca hreṣāyamāṇā dhāvamānā sarvam api jana-samūham ākulīcakruḥ /
GK22vispancu:7717: atrāntare rājā saviṣādaḥ śālihotrajñān vaidyān āhūya provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:7720: proktam atra viṣaye bhagavatā śālihotreṇa, yat-
GK22vispancu:7722: aśvānāṃ nāśam abhyeti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //Panc_5.75//
GK22vispancu:7726: kiṃ bahunā, sarve'pi te vānarā vividhāyudha-laguḍa-pāṣāṇādibhir vyāpāditāḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:7727: atha so 'pi vānara-yūthapas taṃ putra-pautra-bhrātṛ-suta-bhāgineyādi-saṅkṣayaṃ jñātvā viṣādam upagataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7729: acintayac ca-katham ahaṃ tasya nṛpāpasadayānṛṇatā-kṛtyenāpakṛtyaṃ kariṣyāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7731: bhayād vā yadi vā kāmāt sa jñeyaḥ puruṣādhamaḥ //Panc_5.76//
GK22vispancu:7732: atha tena vṛddha-vānareṇa kutracit pipāsākulena bhramatā padminī-khaṇḍa-maṇḍitaṃ saraḥ samāsāditam /
GK22vispancu:7733: tad yāvat sūkṣmekṣikayāvalokayati tāvad vanacara-manuṣyāṇāṃ pada-paṅkti-pradeśo 'sti na niṣkramaṇam /
GK22vispancu:7734: tataś cintitam-nūnam atra ākrānte duṣṭa-grāheṇa bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:7736: tathānuṣṭhite tan-madhyād rākṣaso niṣkramya ratna-mālā-vibhūṣita-kaṇṭhas tam uvāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:7737: atra yaḥ salile praveśaṃ karoti sa me bhakṣyaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:7738: tan nāsti dhūrtataras tvat-samo 'nyo yaḥ pānīyam anena vidhinā pibati /
GK22vispancu:7745: vānara āha-asti me kenacid bhūpatinā sahātyantaṃ vairam /
GK22vispancu:7747: tat parivāram api taṃ bhūpatiṃ vākya-prapañcena lobhayitvātra sarasi praveśayāmi /
GK22vispancu:7748: so 'pi śraddheyaṃ vacas tasya śrutvā ratna-mālāṃ dattvā prāha-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:7749: yat samucitaṃ bhavati tat kartavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:7750: vānaro 'pi ratna-mālā-vibhūṣita-kaṇṭho vṛkṣa-prāsādeṣu paribhraman janair dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7755: vānaraḥ prāha-asti kutracid araṇye guptataraṃ mahat saro dhanada-nirmitam /
GK22vispancu:7756: tatra sūrye'rdhodite ravi-vāre yaḥ kaścin nimajjati,
GK22vispancu:7764: eṣa pratyakṣatayā mat-kaṇṭha-sthitayā ratna-mālayā pratyayas te /
GK22vispancu:7765: tad yadi ratna-mālayā prayojanaṃ tan mayā saha kam api preṣaya,
GK22vispancu:7767: tac chrutvā nṛpatir āha-yady evaṃ tad ahaṃ sa-parijanaḥ svayam eṣyāmi,
